original: skar ma rgyal la sogs pa ni bris sku brtsam pa'i dus bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: skar ma rgyal la sogs pa ni bris sku brtsam pa'i dus bstan pa yin no //
translated: The star Puṣya, etc., indicate the time for beginning the painting.

original: yi dags sen rtsi zhes bya ba la sogs pa la ro'i sen rtsi dang / bal gyi sdong bu byas la mar chen zhes bya ba til mar chen po'i mar las me sbar bar bya'o //
analyzed: yi dags sen rtsi zhes bya ba la sogs pa la ro'i sen rtsi dang / bal gyi sdong bu byas la mar chen zhes bya ba til mar chen po'i mar las me sbar bar bya'o //
translated: The hungry ghost, the fingernail, etc., means that one should make a wick from a human fingernail and human fat, and light a lamp with sesame oil.

original: dri'i zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad de des bsgos pa'o //
analyzed: dri'i zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad de des bsgos pa'o //
translated: The perfume is Vairocana, and it is anointed with that.

original: 'dir 'dug pa ni sha chen skam po dang btsor du bcas pa gzung bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'dir 'dug pa ni sha chen skam po dang btsor du bcas pa gzung bar bya'o //
translated: Here, one should take the dry and cooked human flesh.

original: mchod pa'i cho ga de nyid slar gsungs pa /
analyzed: mchod pa'i cho ga de nyid slar gsungs pa /
translated: The same rite of worship is again stated:

original: me tog dmar dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: me tog dmar dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: With red flowers, etc.

original: nye bar spyod pa'i gtong ma zhes bya ba ni nya rlon dang bcas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nye bar spyod pa'i gtong ma zhes bya ba ni nya rlon dang bcas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The offering of enjoyments means that it is fresh.

original: rdzas lnga zhes @127b bya ba ni bdud rtsi lnga dang ldan pa'i rnam pa lnga la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: rdzas lnga zhes @127b bya ba ni bdud rtsi lnga dang ldan pa'i rnam pa lnga la sogs pa'o //
translated: The five substances are the five nectars, the five aspects, etc.

original: bdud rtsi lnga zhes bya ba ni dam tshig gi aarga'i chu sbyin pa'o //
analyzed: bdud rtsi lnga zhes bya ba ni dam tshig gi aarga'i chu sbyin pa'o //
translated: The five nectars are the offering of pledge argha water.

original: rnal 'byor ma dang gnyis med pa'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma dang gnyis med pa'o //
translated: and the Yoginī are nondual.

original: byin gyis rlobs la nga sgrubs shig / ces bya ba ni sgrub pa pos smra bar bya ba ste /
analyzed: byin gyis rlobs la nga sgrubs shig / ces bya ba ni sgrub pa pos smra bar bya ba ste /
translated: “Consecrate and accomplish me” is what the adept should say,

original: kye khyod dang nga gnyis su med par gyis shig ces pa'i bar du'o //🔽zad pa nyid du longs spyod bya //
analyzed: kye khyod dang nga gnyis su med par gyis shig ces pa'i bar du'o // zad pa nyid du longs spyod bya //
translated: meaning, “O, make me nondual with you.”

original: zhes bya ba ni lhag ma med par spyad na ster gyi gzhan du ni ma yin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni lhag ma med par spyad na ster gyi gzhan du ni ma yin no //
translated: “Enjoy it as exhausted” means that if one practices without remainder, [the deity] gives [the adept] what he wants, but not otherwise.

original: drag mo'i sa bon ni ksham ste gal te sngon du 'bum phrag tu bzlas kyang ma grub pa de'i tshe aom kshum di pe shra ri h'um phu phu ha kshum zhes bya ba'i sngags 'bum du bzlas pas gzir bar bya'o //
analyzed: drag mo'i sa bon ni ksham ste gal te sngon du 'bum phrag tu bzlas kyang ma grub pa de'i tshe aom kshum di pe shra ri h'um phu phu ha kshum zhes bya ba'i sngags 'bum du bzlas pas gzir bar bya'o //
translated: The seed of Caṇḍī is kṣaṃ. If one recites [the mantra] a hundred thousand times and still does not succeed, then one should recite the mantra “Oṃ kṣuṃ dīpiśvari hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ ha kṣuṃ” a hundred thousand times and threaten [the deity].

original: lhag ma ni go sla'o //🔽sa la khrag gis byugs nas su //
analyzed: lhag ma ni go sla'o // sa la khrag gis byugs nas su //
translated: The rest is easy to understand.

original: zhes bya ba ni dur khrod kyi sa gzhi la khrag gis kun du byugs nas bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni dur khrod kyi sa gzhi la khrag gis kun du byugs nas bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: “Having smeared the ground with blood” means that one should practice on a charnel ground smeared all over with blood.

original: rdo rje ma'i sa bon ni yi ge sum mo //
analyzed: rdo rje ma'i sa bon ni yi ge sum mo //
translated: The seed of Vajrī is the letter suṃ.

original: ro langs ma'i sa bon ni yi ge yum ngo //
analyzed: ro langs ma'i sa bon ni yi ge yum ngo //
translated: The seed of the Vetāla is the syllable of the mother.

original: gzhan yang rlung zhes bya ba ni gang dang gang du 'dod pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan yang rlung zhes bya ba ni gang dang gang du 'dod pa'o //
translated: Moreover, “wind” means wherever one desires.

original: kri zhes bya ba dang gsong pa dang / zhes bya ba la gsod pa ni yi ge phat do //
analyzed: kri zhes bya ba dang gsong pa dang / zhes bya ba la gsod pa ni yi ge phat do //
translated: “Kṛ” means killing, and “kṣa” means burning.

original: me sbar ba yi dbus su ni //
analyzed: me sbar ba yi dbus su ni //
translated: In the middle of a blazing fire,

original: zhes bya ba ni sbyin sreg bya zhes bya ba dang 'brel to //🔽ba la ta ka nag po'i shing //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sbyin sreg bya zhes bya ba dang 'brel to // ba la ta ka nag po'i shing //
translated: one should offer oblations, it is said.🔽The wood of the black bālaka tree

original: zhes bya ba ni ba la ta ka dang ri ti ka zhes bya ba'i shing ngo //🔽yungs kar dang ni bsres nas su //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni ba la ta ka dang ri ti ka zhes bya ba'i shing ngo // yungs kar dang ni bsres nas su //
translated: is the wood of the bālaka and the rītika trees.🔽Having mixed it with mustard seeds,

original: zhes bya ba ni pho nya de'i ras ris ral gri dum bu dum bur gtubs pa dang ngo ;
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni pho nya de'i ras ris ral gri dum bu dum bur gtubs pa dang ngo ;
translated: one should cut the cloth of the messenger into pieces with a sword.

original: / kha cig ni pho nya'i ming nas bzung nas yungs kar 'ba' zhig bsreg go zhes zer ro //
analyzed: / kha cig ni pho nya'i ming nas bzung nas yungs kar 'ba' zhig bsreg go zhes zer ro //
translated: Some say that, having taken the name of the messenger, one should offer only mustard seeds.

original: mu sundi zhes bya ba ni phub chung ngo //
analyzed: mu sundi zhes bya ba ni phub chung ngo //
translated: “Musundī” means a small shield.

original: kha cig ni mtshon cha'i bye brag zhig go zhes zer ro //
analyzed: kha cig ni mtshon cha'i bye brag zhig go zhes zer ro //
translated: Some say it is a type of weapon.

original: sbyor ba'i rim pa de nyid kyis //
analyzed: sbyor ba'i rim pa de nyid kyis //
translated: By that very sequence of practice,

original: zhes bya ba ni rang gi ming gi yi ge'i sa bon las byung ba'i sbyor ba de nyid kyis gza' rnams kyang bsgrub par bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rang gi ming gi yi ge'i sa bon las byung ba'i sbyor ba de nyid kyis gza' rnams kyang bsgrub par bya ba'i don to //
translated: This is the accomplishment of the planets by the same procedure that arose from the seed syllables of their own names.

original: aom zhes bya ba dang po ste /
analyzed: aom zhes bya ba dang po ste /
translated: The syllable OM is at the beginning,

original: sv'a h'a'i mtha' can byin gyis brlab //
analyzed: sv'a h'a'i mtha' can byin gyis brlab //
translated: and SVĀHĀ at the end is the consecration.

original: ces pa ni sngags thams cad kyi klad du aom zhes bya ba gdon zhing mthar sv'a h'a zhes bya ba bzla'o //🔽de dag gis ni 'di skad du gang gi tshe gza' rnams dus gcig tu bsgrub par 'dod ni de'i tshe padma 'dab ma brgyad pa'i 'dab ma rnams la nyi ma la sogs pa rim bzhin bkod la dbus su 'byung po 'dul byed kyi gzugs bsams nas aom sarba
analyzed: ces pa ni sngags thams cad kyi klad du aom zhes bya ba gdon zhing mthar sv'a h'a zhes bya ba bzla'o // de dag gis ni 'di skad du gang gi tshe gza' rnams dus gcig tu bsgrub par 'dod ni de'i tshe padma 'dab ma brgyad pa'i 'dab ma rnams la nyi ma la sogs pa rim bzhin bkod la dbus su 'byung po 'dul byed kyi gzugs bsams nas aom sarba
translated: This means that at the beginning of all mantras one should utter OM, and at the end one should recite SVĀHĀ.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs par sngags bzla bar bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs par sngags bzla bar bya'o //
translated: This is what they say. When one wishes to accomplish the planets all together, one should arrange the sun and so forth in order on the petals of an eight-petaled lotus, visualize the form of Vināyaka in the center, and recite the mantra beginning with OM SARVA GAṆA VINAYAKA.

original: gang gi tshe so sor bsgrub par 'dod na ni gang bsgrub par bya ba de nyid dbus su bzhag nas rang gi @128a * //
analyzed: gang gi tshe so sor bsgrub par 'dod na ni gang bsgrub par bya ba de nyid dbus su bzhag nas rang gi @128a * //
translated: When one wishes to accomplish them individually, one should place the one to be accomplished in the center, and visualize the others in the directions.

original: ming dbus su bcug pa'i aom dang sv'a h'a'i sngags bzla bar bya'o //
analyzed: ming dbus su bcug pa'i aom dang sv'a h'a'i sngags bzla bar bya'o //
translated: One should recite the mantra with the name inserted in the middle, with Oṃ and svāhā.

original: gal te de gzas zin pa zhi bar 'dod pa yin na ni gza' rnams kyi thun mong gi sngags bsgrub par bya ba'i ming dang spel bar bzlas par bya'o zhes ston par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te de gzas zin pa zhi bar 'dod pa yin na ni gza' rnams kyi thun mong gi sngags bsgrub par bya ba'i ming dang spel bar bzlas par bya'o zhes ston par 'gyur ro //
translated: If one wishes to pacify the affliction of that [person], one should recite the mantra common to all planets, with the name of the one to be accomplished inserted.

original: 'byung po thams cad ces bya ba ni bde byed la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: 'byung po thams cad ces bya ba ni bde byed la sogs pa'o //
translated: All spirits are Bhairava and so forth.

original: gdon thams cad ces bya ba ni gza' nyi ma la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: gdon thams cad ces bya ba ni gza' nyi ma la sogs pa'o //
translated: All grahas are the sun and so forth.

original: sgrub thabs ni de rnams bskyed pa'i cho ga la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: sgrub thabs ni de rnams bskyed pa'i cho ga la sogs pa'o //
translated: The means of accomplishment is the ritual for generating them and so forth.

original: 'byung ba ni bstan pa'o //
analyzed: 'byung ba ni bstan pa'o //
translated: The emergence is the teaching.

original: gzhung gi tshogs ni rim par phye ba ste bcu dgu pa'o //
analyzed: gzhung gi tshogs ni rim par phye ba ste bcu dgu pa'o //
translated: The collection of texts is the nineteen chapters.

original: rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i rnam par bshad pa las le'u bcu dgu pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o /
analyzed: rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i rnam par bshad pa las le'u bcu dgu pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o /
translated: This completes the explanation of the nineteenth chapter in the great king of tantras, the glorious Vajraḍāka.

original: // / da ni 'chi ltas kyi le'u gsungs pa /
analyzed: // / da ni 'chi ltas kyi le'u gsungs pa /
translated: Now, the chapter on the signs of death is stated:

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: Then, and so forth.

original: de nas zhes bya ba ni gza' la sogs pa gdul ba'i cho ga bshad kyi 'og tu'o //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba ni gza' la sogs pa gdul ba'i cho ga bshad kyi 'og tu'o //
translated: Then means after the explanation of the ritual for subduing planets, etc.

original: de las zhes bya ba ni rgyu'i don to //
analyzed: de las zhes bya ba ni rgyu'i don to //
translated: From that means in the sense of cause.

original: gang gi phyir gza' la sogs pa'i nyes pas 'chi bar 'gyur bas de'i mtshan ma shes par bya ste /
analyzed: gang gi phyir gza' la sogs pa'i nyes pas 'chi bar 'gyur bas de'i mtshan ma shes par bya ste /
translated: Because of the fault of planets, etc., one dies, so one should know the signs of that.

original: gza' la sogs pa'i gdon zhi bar bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das la lha mo rnams kyis gsol to zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: gza' la sogs pa'i gdon zhi bar bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das la lha mo rnams kyis gsol to zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: The goddesses request the Blessed One for the sake of pacifying the grahas, etc.

original: ye shes de nyid ces bya ba ni nang gi 'chi ltas las ye shes kyi de kho na nyid de rlung gi rang bzhin gyi 'chi ltas so //
analyzed: ye shes de nyid ces bya ba ni nang gi 'chi ltas las ye shes kyi de kho na nyid de rlung gi rang bzhin gyi 'chi ltas so //
translated: That very knowledge is the reality of knowledge from the inner signs of death, which are the signs of death having the nature of wind.

original: sgyu ma che zhes bya ba ni bod pa'o //🔽rtsa chen po ni sum cu gnyis //
analyzed: sgyu ma che zhes bya ba ni bod pa'o // rtsa chen po ni sum cu gnyis //
translated: Great illusion means deception.🔽The great channels are thirty-two.

original: zhes bya ba ni ji ltar grags pa'i rtsa chen po sum cu rtsa gnyis te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni ji ltar grags pa'i rtsa chen po sum cu rtsa gnyis te /
translated: The thirty-two great channels are well-known.

original: 'di la mdzes ma dang ro bcud ma dang kun bskyod ma gsum ni pa llir dang m'a la ya'i ming can gyi mgo bo'i yan lag gi smin ma'i dbus dang g-yas g-yon gyi cha la gnas te /
analyzed: 'di la mdzes ma dang ro bcud ma dang kun bskyod ma gsum ni pa llir dang m'a la ya'i ming can gyi mgo bo'i yan lag gi smin ma'i dbus dang g-yas g-yon gyi cha la gnas te /
translated: In this case, the three goddesses Sundarī, Rasavihārī, and Cārucāriṇī are located in the head, in the middle and right and left parts of the eyebrows, and are called Pāṭali and Mālaya.

original: rngul dang snying stobs dang mun pa'i rang bzhin gyis gnas pa yin no //
analyzed: rngul dang snying stobs dang mun pa'i rang bzhin gyis gnas pa yin no //
translated: They are located in the nature of sweat, courage, and darkness.

original: sum rim ma dang 'dod pa mo dang / khyim ma dang / gtum mo dang / bdud 'dul ma ste lnga po 'di dag ni k'anytsi'i ming can gyi snying ga'i padmar bsten nas bdud rtsi lnga 'bab pas nye bar gnas pa yin no //
analyzed: sum rim ma dang 'dod pa mo dang / khyim ma dang / gtum mo dang / bdud 'dul ma ste lnga po 'di dag ni k'anytsi'i ming can gyi snying ga'i padmar bsten nas bdud rtsi lnga 'bab pas nye bar gnas pa yin no //
translated: The five goddesses Trivikramā, Kāminī, Gṛhini, Caṇḍī, and Mārajit are located in the lotus of the heart, called Kañci. They are located in the vicinity of the five nectars.

original: lhag ma nyi shu rtsa bzhi dgod pa 'dir brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: lhag ma nyi shu rtsa bzhi dgod pa 'dir brjod par bya ste /
translated: The remaining twenty-four goddesses should be mentioned here.

original: mi phyed ma ni yul m'a la ya'i ming can gyi mgo'i dpral ba'i cha la gnas pa yin no //
analyzed: mi phyed ma ni yul m'a la ya'i ming can gyi mgo'i dpral ba'i cha la gnas pa yin no //
translated: The goddess Abhedyā is located in the forehead of the head, in the country called Māla.

original: phra mo na ni spyi gtsug na'o //
analyzed: phra mo na ni spyi gtsug na'o //
translated: The goddess Sūkṣmā is located in the crown of the head.

original: gsal ba ni rna ba g-yas na'o //
analyzed: gsal ba ni rna ba g-yas na'o //
translated: The goddess Prakāśā is located in the right ear.

original: g-yon pa na ni mgo bo'i rgyab kyi cha la'o //
analyzed: g-yon pa na ni mgo bo'i rgyab kyi cha la'o //
translated: The goddess Vāmeśvarī is located in the back of the head.

original: 'dul byed ma ni rna ba g-yon pa na'o //
analyzed: 'dul byed ma ni rna ba g-yon pa na'o //
translated: The one who tames is in the left ear.

original: rus sbal skyes ma ni smin ma'i @128b dbus na'o //
analyzed: rus sbal skyes ma ni smin ma'i @128b dbus na'o //
translated: The tortoise-born is in the middle of the eyebrows.

original: sred pa mo ni mig gnyis na'o //
analyzed: sred pa mo ni mig gnyis na'o //
translated: The one of craving is in the two eyes.

original: dbang skyur ma ni phrag pa gnyis na'o //🔽sdang ba mo ni mchan khung gnyis na'o //
analyzed: dbang skyur ma ni phrag pa gnyis na'o // sdang ba mo ni mchan khung gnyis na'o //
translated: The one of the lord is in the two shoulders.🔽The one of hatred is in the two armpits.

original: 'jug pa mo ni nu ma gnyis su'o //
analyzed: 'jug pa mo ni nu ma gnyis su'o //
translated: The one of engagement is in the two breasts.

original: ma mo ni lte bar ro //
analyzed: ma mo ni lte bar ro //
translated: The mother is in the navel.

original: mtshan mo ni sna rtser ro //
analyzed: mtshan mo ni sna rtser ro //
translated: The night is at the tip of the nose.

original: bsil ster ma ni khar ro //
analyzed: bsil ster ma ni khar ro //
translated: The one who gives coolness is in the mouth.

original: drod ma ni mgrin par ro //
analyzed: drod ma ni mgrin par ro //
translated: The one of heat is in the throat.

original: tshad ma ni slar yang snying gar ro //
analyzed: tshad ma ni slar yang snying gar ro //
translated: The one of measure is again in the heart.

original: mdog sngon ma ni chu ser ro //
analyzed: mdog sngon ma ni chu ser ro //
translated: The blue-colored one is in the lymph.

original: thun mong ma ni mtshan la'o //
analyzed: thun mong ma ni mtshan la'o //
translated: The common one is in the genitals.

original: rgyu sbyin ma ni gzhang la'o //
analyzed: rgyu sbyin ma ni gzhang la'o //
translated: The one who gives a cause is in the anus.

original: bral ba mo ni brla gnyis la'o //
analyzed: bral ba mo ni brla gnyis la'o //
translated: The one of separation is in the two thighs.

original: mdza' mo ni byin pa gnyis la'o //
analyzed: mdza' mo ni byin pa gnyis la'o //
translated: The friend is in the two calves.

original: grub ma ni sor mo thams cad la'o //
analyzed: grub ma ni sor mo thams cad la'o //
translated: The accomplished one is in all the fingers.

original: me mo ni rkang pa'i po la gnyis la'o //
analyzed: me mo ni rkang pa'i po la gnyis la'o //
translated: The one of fire is in the two ankles.

original: yid 'ong ma ni rkang pa'i mthe bong gnyis la'o //
analyzed: yid 'ong ma ni rkang pa'i mthe bong gnyis la'o //
translated: The one who is pleasing is in the two big toes.

original: gsum pa ma ni pus mo'i lhang gnyis te /
analyzed: gsum pa ma ni pus mo'i lhang gnyis te /
translated: The third one is in the two knees.

original: thams cad bsdoms pas sum cu rtsa gnyis so //
analyzed: thams cad bsdoms pas sum cu rtsa gnyis so //
translated: The total is thirty-two.

original: de dag gzhan las shin tu gtso //
analyzed: de dag gzhan las shin tu gtso //
translated: They are the most important of the others.

original: zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems kyi rtsa gnyis po de dag rtsa gzhan la ltos nas gtso bo dang dam pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems kyi rtsa gnyis po de dag rtsa gzhan la ltos nas gtso bo dang dam pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of the words “the most important” and “the best” is in relation to the other channels.

original: bcu dang gnyis ni de bzhin du //🔽zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: bcu dang gnyis ni de bzhin du // zhes bya ba la /
translated: The ten and the two are the same.🔽The ten and the two are the twelve.

original: bcu dang gnyis ni bcu gnyis pa phrag gnyis te nyi shu rtsa bzhi'o //
analyzed: bcu dang gnyis ni bcu gnyis pa phrag gnyis te nyi shu rtsa bzhi'o //
translated: The two groups of twelve are twenty-four.

original: de bzhin du zhes bya ba ni de dag gi nang na yang dam par 'gyur pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du zhes bya ba ni de dag gi nang na yang dam par 'gyur pa'o //
translated: The same means that they are the best of those.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: dbyangs rnams 'pho ba'i mtshan nyid de //
analyzed: dbyangs rnams 'pho ba'i mtshan nyid de //
translated: The vowels are the characteristics of the movement.

original: zhes bya ba la dbyangs rnams ni ma ning gi yi ge bzhi spangs pa'i dbyangs kyi yi ge bcu gnyis so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la dbyangs rnams ni ma ning gi yi ge bzhi spangs pa'i dbyangs kyi yi ge bcu gnyis so //
translated: The vowels are the twelve vowels excluding the four neutral letters.

original: 'pho ba ni tshis kyi bye brag gis rtsa dang der yi ge dang de'i gzugs kyis 'gro ba'o //
analyzed: 'pho ba ni tshis kyi bye brag gis rtsa dang der yi ge dang de'i gzugs kyis 'gro ba'o //
translated: Movement is the going in the channels and in the letters and their forms by the differences of the parts.

original: mtshan nyid ni de'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: mtshan nyid ni de'i rang bzhin no //
translated: Characteristics are their natures.

original: ji ltar 'gro zhe na yar ngo mar do'i bye brag gis te zla ba yar do dang mar do'i bye brag gis te zla ba yar do dang mar ngo'i bye brag gis thabs dang shes rab kyi rang bzhin kha steng du bltas pa dang thur du blas pa'i
analyzed: ji ltar 'gro zhe na yar ngo mar do'i bye brag gis te zla ba yar do dang mar do'i bye brag gis te zla ba yar do dang mar ngo'i bye brag gis thabs dang shes rab kyi rang bzhin kha steng du bltas pa dang thur du blas pa'i
translated: How do they move? They move in the twelve houses of the ascendant and the descendent, that is, in the twelve houses of the waxing and waning moon.

original: rang bzhin gyi dbyangs kyi yi ge bcu gnyis su 'pho ba ste /
analyzed: rang bzhin gyi dbyangs kyi yi ge bcu gnyis su 'pho ba ste /
translated: The twelve vowels move in the twelve houses of the waxing and waning moon, that is, in the twelve houses of the ascendant and the descendent, in the nature of method and wisdom, facing upward and downward.🔽In the twelve houses of the waxing moon, the twelve vowels a and so on abide in the form of the twelve houses of the ascendant, which are Pulliramalaya, Jalandhara, Oḍiyāna, Arbuda, Godāvarī, Rāmeśvara, Devikoṭi, Himālaya,

original: de la pulli ra dang m'a la ya dang / dz'a landha ra dang / ao ti ya na dang / aarbu da dang / go d'a ba ri dang / r'a me shva ra dang / de b'i ko ti dang / hi m'a la ya dang /
analyzed: de la pulli ra dang m'a la ya dang / dz'a landha ra dang / ao ti ya na dang / aarbu da dang / go d'a ba ri dang / r'a me shva ra dang / de b'i ko ti dang / hi m'a la ya dang /
translated: Kāmarūpa, Oḍra, Triśakuni, and Kośala.

original: k'a ma r'u pa dang / aoo te dang / tri sha ku ne dang / ko sa la'i yul rnams su yar ngo'i nyi ma bcu gnyis la aa la sogs pa'i gzugs kyis gnas pa yin te /
analyzed: k'a ma r'u pa dang / aoo te dang / tri sha ku ne dang / ko sa la'i yul rnams su yar ngo'i nyi ma bcu gnyis la aa la sogs pa'i gzugs kyis gnas pa yin te /
translated: In the twelve houses of the waning moon, the twelve vowels a and so on abide in the form of the twelve houses of the descendent.

original: de'i tshe pho nya la sogs pas gnas de dang der reg pa las yi ge de dang de'i skyon dang yon tan shes par bya'o zhes sngar bshad pa dang sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: de'i tshe pho nya la sogs pas gnas de dang der reg pa las yi ge de dang de'i skyon dang yon tan shes par bya'o zhes sngar bshad pa dang sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: At that time, the messenger and so on should know the faults and virtues of each letter from touching that place and that place.

original: de bzhin du zla ba mar ngo la ka lingka la sogs pa'i gnas rnams su yi ge bcu gnyis kyi gzugs kyis gnas pa la reg pa'i mtshan ma @129a * //
analyzed: de bzhin du zla ba mar ngo la ka lingka la sogs pa'i gnas rnams su yi ge bcu gnyis kyi gzugs kyis gnas pa la reg pa'i mtshan ma @129a * //
translated: In the same way, one should know the signs of touching the twelve letters that abide in the form of the twelve places such as Kaliṅga on the waning moon.

original: blta ba yang tshul de ltar shes par bya'o //
analyzed: blta ba yang tshul de ltar shes par bya'o //
translated: One should know the method in that way.

original: nyi shu rtsa bzhir brjod pa yin //
analyzed: nyi shu rtsa bzhir brjod pa yin //
translated: The twenty-four are said to be

original: zhes bya ba ni tshes bcu gsum dang / bcu bzhi dang bco lnga rnams zla ba'i ngo gnyis ka la yang tshes gsum dang bzhi dang lngar bsdus nas nyi ma nyi shu rtsa bzhir brtsi bar bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni tshes bcu gsum dang / bcu bzhi dang bco lnga rnams zla ba'i ngo gnyis ka la yang tshes gsum dang bzhi dang lngar bsdus nas nyi ma nyi shu rtsa bzhir brtsi bar bya'o //
translated: The thirteenth, fourteenth, and fifteenth days are counted as the twenty-four days by including the third, fourth, and fifth days in both the bright and dark fortnights.🔽The fresh and the old

original: dus ni gsar dang rnyid pa dag / ces pa la gsar pha ni dus myur ba myur bar 'chi ba'o //
analyzed: dus ni gsar dang rnyid pa dag / ces pa la gsar pha ni dus myur ba myur bar 'chi ba'o //
translated: The fresh is a quick death.

original: rnying pa ni dus ring mo ring mo zhig na 'chi ba ste de dag gi mtshan ma'o //
analyzed: rnying pa ni dus ring mo ring mo zhig na 'chi ba ste de dag gi mtshan ma'o //
translated: The old is death after a long time. These are the signs.

original: 'chi ba'i dus la bab par gnas //
analyzed: 'chi ba'i dus la bab par gnas //
translated: One remains at the time of death.

original: zhes bya ba nges par 'chi ba'i dus la bab par ston pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba nges par 'chi ba'i dus la bab par ston pa'o //
translated: This shows that the time of death is certain.

original: dbugs ni rnam par rgod tsam gyis //
analyzed: dbugs ni rnam par rgod tsam gyis //
translated: The breath moves only a little.

original: zhes bya ba ni dbugs tha mal par gnas pa'i mtshan nyid las phyin ci log tu rgyu ba ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni dbugs tha mal par gnas pa'i mtshan nyid las phyin ci log tu rgyu ba ste /
translated: This is the movement of the breath in the opposite way from its usual character.

original: 'phel ba dang 'bri bar gnas pa'o //
analyzed: 'phel ba dang 'bri bar gnas pa'o //
translated: It remains increasing and decreasing.

original: rgyas par ni 'og nas bshad par bya'o //
analyzed: rgyas par ni 'og nas bshad par bya'o //
translated: This will be explained in detail below.

original: lus can drug dang gnyis kyi 'chi //
analyzed: lus can drug dang gnyis kyi 'chi //
translated: Death comes for the six and two.

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: Here,

original: drug dang gnyis ni brgyad de /
analyzed: drug dang gnyis ni brgyad de /
translated: the six and two are eight.

original: gal te nyi ma brgyad du rlung phyin ci log tu rgyu bar gyur na /🔽lo gnyis dang zla ba bzhi dang nyi ma nyi shu rtsa bzhis 'chi bar 'gyur ba yin te /
analyzed: gal te nyi ma brgyad du rlung phyin ci log tu rgyu bar gyur na / lo gnyis dang zla ba bzhi dang nyi ma nyi shu rtsa bzhis 'chi bar 'gyur ba yin te /
translated: If the winds move in the opposite way for eight days,🔽one will die in two years, four months, and twenty-four days.

original: de bzhin lo gnyis zla ba ni //
analyzed: de bzhin lo gnyis zla ba ni //
translated: Thus, two years and four months.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'og nas 'byung ba'i tshigs su bcad pa dang sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'og nas 'byung ba'i tshigs su bcad pa dang sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: This is to be applied to the verses that will come later.

original: 'chi ba ni srog zad par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: 'chi ba ni srog zad par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: Death is the exhaustion of life.

original: snga dro ro hi ta'i dus su //
analyzed: snga dro ro hi ta'i dus su //
translated: In the morning, at the time of Rohita,

original: de yi mtshan ma mtshon par bya //🔽zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: de yi mtshan ma mtshon par bya // zhes bya ba la /
translated: one should observe its sign.

original: nam langs nas thun phyed kyi bar du ni ro hi ta'i dus te der rtag tu blta ba dang / de nas bzung ste brtsi bar bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: nam langs nas thun phyed kyi bar du ni ro hi ta'i dus te der rtag tu blta ba dang / de nas bzung ste brtsi bar bya ba'i don to //
translated: In the first half of the watch after dawn, it is the time of Rohita. There, one should always look and count from there.

original: lus kyi mtshan ma'i gnas gsungs pa /🔽sna dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: lus kyi mtshan ma'i gnas gsungs pa / sna dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: The places of the body signs are stated:🔽nose, etc.

original: brla dang byin pa de bzhin gzhan //
analyzed: brla dang byin pa de bzhin gzhan //
translated: Thighs, calves, and others

original: zhes bya ba ni brla dag dang byin pa dag tu'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni brla dag dang byin pa dag tu'o //
translated: means in the thighs and calves.

original: dbugs ni chad cing chad gyur pa //
analyzed: dbugs ni chad cing chad gyur pa //
translated: When the breath is cut off and ceases,

original: zhes bya ba ni srog 'chad pa ste 'chi bar 'gyur pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni srog 'chad pa ste 'chi bar 'gyur pa'o //
translated: means when life is cut off, one will die.

original: 'chi ba'i dus ni ston par byed //
analyzed: 'chi ba'i dus ni ston par byed //
translated: It shows the time of death.

original: ces bya ba ni lus can rnams kyi srog dus ji snyeng cig gis 'jig par 'gyur ba'i mtshan ma gsal por ston pa'o //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni lus can rnams kyi srog dus ji snyeng cig gis 'jig par 'gyur ba'i mtshan ma gsal por ston pa'o //
translated: This shows the clear signs of the life-span of embodied beings being destroyed in a certain time.

original: nyi ma'i grangs kyi tshad kyis ni //
analyzed: nyi ma'i grangs kyi tshad kyis ni //
translated: By the measure of the number of days,

original: zhes bya ba ni nyi ma lnga dang drug la sogs pa'i rlung phyin ci log tu rgyu ba'i stobs kyis so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni nyi ma lnga dang drug la sogs pa'i rlung phyin ci log tu rgyu ba'i stobs kyis so //
translated: by the power of the winds moving in the reverse order for five, six, and so on days.

original: 'khor los dus kyi bdag nyid brtsi //
analyzed: 'khor los dus kyi bdag nyid brtsi //
translated: The wheel is the calculation of the nature of time.

original: zhes bya ba la dus kyi bdag nyid ni lo dang zla ba la sogs pa ji snyed cig gis 'chi bar 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la dus kyi bdag nyid ni lo dang zla ba la sogs pa ji snyed cig gis 'chi bar 'gyur ba'o //
translated: The nature of time is the number of years, months, and so on, by which one will die.

original: gang gis she na /
analyzed: gang gis she na /
translated: By what?

original: 'khor los te /
analyzed: 'khor los te /
translated: By the wheel.

original: dus kyi 'khor lo bri ba sngar bshad pa lta bus so //
analyzed: dus kyi 'khor lo bri ba sngar bshad pa lta bus so //
translated: By the previously explained drawing of the Kālacakra.

original: sgo gcig nas ni nyin drug tu //
analyzed: sgo gcig nas ni nyin drug tu //
translated: From one door for six days,

original: @129b zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: @129b zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: and so on.

original: 'og nas lnga nas nyi shu rtsa lnga'i bar 'di dag gi brjod bya ste /
analyzed: 'og nas lnga nas nyi shu rtsa lnga'i bar 'di dag gi brjod bya ste /
translated: The subject matter of these from five to twenty-five below is

original: de nas bcu gsum bcu gsum gyi bar du re re spel bar bya //
analyzed: de nas bcu gsum bcu gsum gyi bar du re re spel bar bya //
translated: then increasing by thirteen up to twenty-five.

original: dgun zla ba chungs nyi ma la mtshungs gsum mig zla ba drug / gsum zung zla ste zla lhag tshes phyogs mda' yon tan thig le //
analyzed: dgun zla ba chungs nyi ma la mtshungs gsum mig zla ba drug / gsum zung zla ste zla lhag tshes phyogs mda' yon tan thig le //
translated: The three equal to the sun in the winter months, the three equal to the moon in the summer months, the three pairs equal to the moon in the six months, the moon plus the lunar day in the direction of the sun, the arrow, the quality, and the drop.

original: zhag grangs yin te de dag 'tsho ba bshad pa yin //
analyzed: zhag grangs yin te de dag 'tsho ba bshad pa yin //
translated: The number of days is the life span.

original: lnga las bcu yi bar dang de bzhin bcu las ni //
analyzed: lnga las bcu yi bar dang de bzhin bcu las ni //
translated: From five up to ten, and likewise from ten

original: bco lnga'i bar te de nas nyi shu'i bar dang ni //
analyzed: bco lnga'i bar te de nas nyi shu'i bar dang ni //
translated: up to fifteen, and then up to twenty,

original: de nas nyi shu lnga yi bar du'ang sbyar bar bya //
analyzed: de nas nyi shu lnga yi bar du'ang sbyar bar bya //
translated: and then up to twenty-five.

original: zhes bya ba'i tshigs su bcad pa'i don gyi 'khor lo sngar bshad pa las 'dir ni lnga nas nyi shu rtsa lnga'i bar gyi nyi ma dag gi dus bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i tshigs su bcad pa'i don gyi 'khor lo sngar bshad pa las 'dir ni lnga nas nyi shu rtsa lnga'i bar gyi nyi ma dag gi dus bstan pa yin no //
translated: The meaning of the verse is as follows: The wheel has been explained above. Here, the time of the days from five to twenty-five is taught.

original: de las lnga dang bcu'i bar gyi dang po brtsi bar bya ste /
analyzed: de las lnga dang bcu'i bar gyi dang po brtsi bar bya ste /
translated: From that, the first should be calculated from five up to ten.

original: nyi ma drug tu sgo gcig nas //
analyzed: nyi ma drug tu sgo gcig nas //
translated: For six days, from one door.

original: zhes bya ba la g-yas kyi sgo nas rgyu gyur pa //🔽zhes bya ba dang sbyar te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la g-yas kyi sgo nas rgyu gyur pa // zhes bya ba dang sbyar te /
translated: Here, the right door is meant.

original: des ji snyed cig gis 'che bar 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: des ji snyed cig gis 'che bar 'gyur zhe na /
translated: By how many does it move?

original: de nyid bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de nyid bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to demonstrate that, it is said:

original: yon tan gsum gyi lo dag ni //
analyzed: yon tan gsum gyi lo dag ni //
translated: The years of the three qualities

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: and so forth.

original: lo re re zhing zhag drug cu dang bcas pa'i zhag sum brgya sum brgyar gnas pa las sngar bstan pa ltar rlung phyin ci log tu rgyu ba la yon tan gsum gyi lo ste lo gsum du 'tsho ba las /
analyzed: lo re re zhing zhag drug cu dang bcas pa'i zhag sum brgya sum brgyar gnas pa las sngar bstan pa ltar rlung phyin ci log tu rgyu ba la yon tan gsum gyi lo ste lo gsum du 'tsho ba las /
translated: Since each year consists of three hundred days together with the sixty days, as previously explained, the years of the three qualities are the three years of life, during which the winds move in reverse.

original: nyi ma drug tu rlung phyin ci log tu rgyu ba 'di'i nyi ma la sogs pa'i tshe'i tshad bri bar bya ste /
analyzed: nyi ma drug tu rlung phyin ci log tu rgyu ba 'di'i nyi ma la sogs pa'i tshe'i tshad bri bar bya ste /
translated: The life-span of this person should be subtracted from the days and so forth of the sun.

original: de nyid bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de nyid bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to demonstrate that, it is said:

original: lo gnyis dang ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: lo gnyis dang ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: two years and so forth.

original: dus kyi grangs zhes bya ba ni zla ba drug go //
analyzed: dus kyi grangs zhes bya ba ni zla ba drug go //
translated: The number of times is six months.

original: lhag ma ni go sla'o //🔽nyi ma dag ni bdun dang mtha' //
analyzed: lhag ma ni go sla'o // nyi ma dag ni bdun dang mtha' //
translated: The rest is easy to understand.🔽If the winds move for seven days

original: gal te rlung ni rgyu gyur na //🔽zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: gal te rlung ni rgyu gyur na // zhes bya ba la /
translated: of the sun and so forth,

original: nyi ma bdun du rlung ste sna sgo'i dbugs phyin ci log tu rgyu bar gyur na'o //
analyzed: nyi ma bdun du rlung ste sna sgo'i dbugs phyin ci log tu rgyu bar gyur na'o //
translated: if the winds move in reverse at the nostrils for seven days of the sun,

original: lo gnyis dang ni de bzhin du //
analyzed: lo gnyis dang ni de bzhin du //
translated: And two years, and likewise

original: zla ba dug tu 'tsho 'gyur zhing //🔽zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zla ba dug tu 'tsho 'gyur zhing // zhes bya ba la /
translated: one lives for six months and ten days.

original: de bzhin zhes bya ba ni nyi ma'i grangs bstan pa ste nyi ma bcu'o //
analyzed: de bzhin zhes bya ba ni nyi ma'i grangs bstan pa ste nyi ma bcu'o //
translated: Here, “and likewise” indicates the number of days, which is ten.

original: 'tsho zhes bya ba ni dus der gnas pa ste de'i 'og tu 'jig par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'tsho zhes bya ba ni dus der gnas pa ste de'i 'og tu 'jig par 'gyur ro //
translated: “One lives” means one remains for that period of time, and after that one dies.

original: de ltar na lo gnyis dang zla ba drug dang nyi ma bcus 'chi bar ston to //🔽de bzhin lo gnyis zla ba ni //
analyzed: de ltar na lo gnyis dang zla ba drug dang nyi ma bcus 'chi bar ston to // de bzhin lo gnyis zla ba ni //
translated: Thus, it is taught that one dies after two years, six months, and ten days.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la de bzhin zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la de bzhin zhes bya ba ni /
translated: “And likewise, for two years and six months” and so on. “And likewise”🔽is a word that connects to the following:

original: dbugs ni rnam par rgod gyur na //
analyzed: dbugs ni rnam par rgod gyur na //
translated: “When the breath is agitated,

original: lus can drug dang gnyis kyis 'chi //🔽zhes bya ba dang 'brel bar byed pa'i tshig yin no //
analyzed: lus can drug dang gnyis kyis 'chi // zhes bya ba dang 'brel bar byed pa'i tshig yin no //
translated: one lives for six and two days.”

original: rig byed ces bya ba ni nges brjod kyi rig byed dang mchod sbyin gyi rig byed dang / snyan tshig gi rig byed dang / sring srung gi rig byed de //
analyzed: rig byed ces bya ba ni nges brjod kyi rig byed dang mchod sbyin gyi rig byed dang / snyan tshig gi rig byed dang / sring srung gi rig byed de //
translated: “Veda” refers to the Ṛg Veda, the Yajur Veda, the Sāma Veda, and the Atharva Veda.

original: @130a * // de'i grangs kyis zla ba'o //
analyzed: @130a * // de'i grangs kyis zla ba'o //
translated: The number of those is the number of months.

original: gal te nyin dgu zhes bya ba la sogs pa la nyi ma'i grangs ni nyi ma bcu gnyis kyi grangs kyi nyin zhag go //
analyzed: gal te nyin dgu zhes bya ba la sogs pa la nyi ma'i grangs ni nyi ma bcu gnyis kyi grangs kyi nyin zhag go //
translated: The number of days is twelve days of the sun.

original: lus can rnams kyi sbyor ba yin //
analyzed: lus can rnams kyi sbyor ba yin //
translated: It is the practice of embodied beings.

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: Here,

original: sbyor ba zhes bya ba ni 'tsho zhing gnas pa'o //
analyzed: sbyor ba zhes bya ba ni 'tsho zhing gnas pa'o //
translated: practice means living and existing.

original: gal te nyin zhag bcu gcig tu //
analyzed: gal te nyin zhag bcu gcig tu //
translated: If for eleven days, etc.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'di ni rkang pa lnga pa'i tshigs su bcad pa yin te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'di ni rkang pa lnga pa'i tshigs su bcad pa yin te /
translated: This is a verse of five lines.

original: sgo gcig ces bya ba ni g-yas kyi sgo 'ba' zhig go //
analyzed: sgo gcig ces bya ba ni g-yas kyi sgo 'ba' zhig go //
translated: One door means only the right door.

original: nyin zhag bcu gnyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: nyin zhag bcu gnyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: If for twelve days, etc.

original: dbyangs kyi grangs zhes bya ba ni klu'i bye brag ste rnam pa bdun no //
analyzed: dbyangs kyi grangs zhes bya ba ni klu'i bye brag ste rnam pa bdun no //
translated: The number of tones means a particular nāga, which is of seven types.

original: dus kyi grangs ni drug ste bshad zin to //
analyzed: dus kyi grangs ni drug ste bshad zin to //
translated: The number of times is six, as already explained.

original: gal te nyi ma bcu gsum du //
analyzed: gal te nyi ma bcu gsum du //
translated: If for thirteen days, etc.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //🔽gal te bdun phrag gnyis su ni //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o // gal te bdun phrag gnyis su ni //
translated: This is easy to understand.🔽If for two weeks, etc.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la bdun phrag gnyis ni bcu bzhir ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la bdun phrag gnyis ni bcu bzhir ro //
translated: Two weeks is fourteen.

original: nyi ma bcu yi phyed dag tu //
analyzed: nyi ma bcu yi phyed dag tu //
translated: For half of ten days

original: zhes bya ba ni nyi ma lnga'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni nyi ma lnga'o //
translated: means for five days.

original: gang zhig nyi ma lnga gsum du //
analyzed: gang zhig nyi ma lnga gsum du //
translated: For one who is for three

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni rkang pa gsum pa'i tshigs su bcad pa ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni rkang pa gsum pa'i tshigs su bcad pa ste /
translated: and so on, is a verse of the third foot.

original: lta 'og gzhan dag tu yang ci rigs su sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: lta 'og gzhan dag tu yang ci rigs su sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: It should be applied in other places as appropriate.

original: lnga gsum zhes bya ba ni bco lnga pa'o //
analyzed: lnga gsum zhes bya ba ni bco lnga pa'o //
translated: Three fives is fifteen.

original: gang zhig brgyad phrag gnyis su ni //
analyzed: gang zhig brgyad phrag gnyis su ni //
translated: For one who is for two eights

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: and so on,

original: brgyad phrag gnyis ni bcu drug ste /
analyzed: brgyad phrag gnyis ni bcu drug ste /
translated: two eights is sixteen.

original: nyi ma bcu drug tu rlung lugs las bzlog nas rgyu ba'i tshe'i tshad bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: nyi ma bcu drug tu rlung lugs las bzlog nas rgyu ba'i tshe'i tshad bstan pa yin no //
translated: It shows the lifespan when the wind moves in the reverse order for sixteen days.

original: lhag ma ni go sla'o //
analyzed: lhag ma ni go sla'o //
translated: The rest is easy to understand.

original: gal te nyin zhag bcu dgu ru //
analyzed: gal te nyin zhag bcu dgu ru //
translated: If for nineteen days

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: and so on,

original: dri'i bzhon pa zhes bya ba ni rlung ste dri thams cad bsdus nas 'dren par byed pa ste rta lta bu'o //
analyzed: dri'i bzhon pa zhes bya ba ni rlung ste dri thams cad bsdus nas 'dren par byed pa ste rta lta bu'o //
translated: the fragrant vehicle is the wind, which collects all smells and carries them like a horse.

original: nyi ma'i lam zhes bya ba ni sna'i sgo g-yas pa ste /
analyzed: nyi ma'i lam zhes bya ba ni sna'i sgo g-yas pa ste /
translated: The sun's path is the right nostril gate.

original: phal cher rlung tsha ba 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: phal cher rlung tsha ba 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
translated: For the most part, it is because of the entry of hot winds.

original: lhag ma ni go sla'o //🔽de las gong ma sngar bstan pa'i //
analyzed: lhag ma ni go sla'o // de las gong ma sngar bstan pa'i //
translated: The rest is easy to understand.🔽From that, the higher is to be known

original: grangs las mdor bsdu shes par bya //
analyzed: grangs las mdor bsdu shes par bya //
translated: in brief by the number taught previously.

original: zhes bya ba ni nyi ma nyi shu rtsa drug nas sum cu'i bar du ni lnga pa'i tshul gyis shes par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni nyi ma nyi shu rtsa drug nas sum cu'i bar du ni lnga pa'i tshul gyis shes par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: From twenty-six days up to thirty, it is to be known by the method of five.

original: yang na de las te sngar bstan pa dag las /
analyzed: yang na de las te sngar bstan pa dag las /
translated: Or, from that, from what was taught previously,

original: gong ma ste lnga nas nyi shu lnga'i bar gyi grangs te 'chi ba'i dus kyi grangs rnams shes par bya ste /
analyzed: gong ma ste lnga nas nyi shu lnga'i bar gyi grangs te 'chi ba'i dus kyi grangs rnams shes par bya ste /
translated: the higher, from five up to twenty-five, the number of the time of death is to be known.

original: 'og nas ston pas der shes par bya'o //
analyzed: 'og nas ston pas der shes par bya'o //
translated: It should be known from what is taught below.

original: bcu dang gnyis kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni gzhung nye bar bsdu ba yin no //
analyzed: bcu dang gnyis kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni gzhung nye bar bsdu ba yin no //
translated: Ten and twelve, etc. is a summary of the text.

original: bcu dang gnyis ni bcu gnyis te /
analyzed: bcu dang gnyis ni bcu gnyis te /
translated: Ten and twelve are twelve.

original: nyi ma lnga nas nyi shu'i bar gyi nyi ma bzhi phrag gsum po dag gis brtsi ba yin no //
analyzed: nyi ma lnga nas nyi shu'i bar gyi nyi ma bzhi phrag gsum po dag gis brtsi ba yin no //
translated: The three groups of four days from five days up to twenty days are counted.

original: bar zhes bya ba ni nyi shu nas nyi shu rtsa lnga'i bar gyi bzhi phrag tha @130b ma'o //
analyzed: bar zhes bya ba ni nyi shu nas nyi shu rtsa lnga'i bar gyi bzhi phrag tha @130b ma'o //
translated: The middle is the last of the four groups of twenty to twenty-five.

original: gzhung kha cig las ni /
analyzed: gzhung kha cig las ni /
translated: In some texts, it is said:

original: bcu dang drug gi rtsis las ni //🔽zhes 'byung ste /
analyzed: bcu dang drug gi rtsis las ni // zhes 'byung ste /
translated: From the calculation of ten and six,

original: de'i tshe shin tu go sla'o //
analyzed: de'i tshe shin tu go sla'o //
translated: at that time it is very easy to understand.

original: shin tu phra bangs bshad la //
analyzed: shin tu phra bangs bshad la //
translated: It is explained as extremely subtle.

original: zhes bya ba ni nang gi mtshan ma ste rlung gi rgyu ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni nang gi mtshan ma ste rlung gi rgyu ba'o //
translated: This is the inner sign, the movement of the wind.

original: khams rnams snyoms pa'i lus la ni //
analyzed: khams rnams snyoms pa'i lus la ni //
translated: In a body with balanced elements,

original: zhes bya ba ni kha zas tshod zin pa dang / rjes su mthun pa'i kha zas za ba dang / nang la sogs pas ma nyams shing mi mthun pa'i rkyen med pa'i tha mal pa'i lus la blta bar bya'i gzhan du ni yid mi ches pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni kha zas tshod zin pa dang / rjes su mthun pa'i kha zas za ba dang / nang la sogs pas ma nyams shing mi mthun pa'i rkyen med pa'i tha mal pa'i lus la blta bar bya'i gzhan du ni yid mi ches pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro //
translated: one should observe in a body that is not damaged by internal and external factors and is free from unfavorable conditions, having eaten food in moderation and suitable food. Otherwise, it becomes a cause of disbelief.

original: de dag ces bya ba ni sngar bstan pa'i nyi ma drug la sogs pa'i 'chi ltas de dag go //
analyzed: de dag ces bya ba ni sngar bstan pa'i nyi ma drug la sogs pa'i 'chi ltas de dag go //
translated: Those means the signs of death such as the six days that were previously taught.

original: da ni nges par 'chi bar 'gyur ba'i lus kyi mtshan ma bstan par bya ba'i phyir sgo zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: da ni nges par 'chi bar 'gyur ba'i lus kyi mtshan ma bstan par bya ba'i phyir sgo zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Here also, one should connect the passage beginning with

original: 'dir yang / khams rnams snyoms pa'i lus la ni //🔽zhes bya ba dang sbyar ro //
analyzed: 'dir yang / khams rnams snyoms pa'i lus la ni // zhes bya ba dang sbyar ro //
translated: in the body which is the balance of the elements.

original: steng du bltas pas zhes bya ba ni dus la bab pan rtsa de steng du pa ltas pa'o //
analyzed: steng du bltas pas zhes bya ba ni dus la bab pan rtsa de steng du pa ltas pa'o //
translated: Looking up means that when the time comes, that channel looks up.

original: yang na yi ge'i gzugs kyis steng du bltas par gnas pa'o //
analyzed: yang na yi ge'i gzugs kyis steng du bltas par gnas pa'o //
translated: Or, it is located looking up in the form of a syllable.

original: sna'i bar sha zhes bya ba ni sna sgo gnyis kyi bar na gnas pa'i sna zam gyi sha'o //
analyzed: sna'i bar sha zhes bya ba ni sna sgo gnyis kyi bar na gnas pa'i sna zam gyi sha'o //
translated: The flesh between the nostrils is the flesh of the bridge of the nose located between the two doors of the nostrils.

original: chad pa ni de'i dbus na gnas pa'i rtsa chad na steng du bltas par 'gyur zhing sna yon por 'gyur te /
analyzed: chad pa ni de'i dbus na gnas pa'i rtsa chad na steng du bltas par 'gyur zhing sna yon por 'gyur te /
translated: When it is cut, that is, when the channel located in its middle is cut, it looks up and the nose becomes crooked.

original: de ni yi ge ri'i gzugs kyis gnas pa yin no //
analyzed: de ni yi ge ri'i gzugs kyis gnas pa yin no //
translated: That is located in the form of the syllable ri.

original: nyin zhag bdun gyis the tshom med //
analyzed: nyin zhag bdun gyis the tshom med //
translated: In seven days, there is no doubt.

original: ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: ces bya ba ni /
translated: This means

original: de bzhin lo gnyis zla ba ni //
analyzed: de bzhin lo gnyis zla ba ni //
translated: In the same way, two years and months

original: rig byed kyi ni grangs dang ni //
analyzed: rig byed kyi ni grangs dang ni //
translated: Are the number of the Vedas.

original: zhes bya ba dang sbyar ba'i nyi ma bdun gyis so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba dang sbyar ba'i nyi ma bdun gyis so //
translated: The seven suns are applied to this.

original: cha shas dgu ni yang dag gnas //
analyzed: cha shas dgu ni yang dag gnas //
translated: The nine parts are well situated.

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: Here,

original: cha shas ni cha ste dbyangs yig dgu pa la bya ba der yang dag par gnas pa ni li'i gzugs su gnas pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: cha shas ni cha ste dbyangs yig dgu pa la bya ba der yang dag par gnas pa ni li'i gzugs su gnas pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: part means portion, referring to the ninth vowel [i]. Well situated there means situated in the form of li. This is the meaning of the statement.

original: de ci zhig ce na /
analyzed: de ci zhig ce na /
translated: What is that?

original: mig ste mig gi rtsa la'o //
analyzed: mig ste mig gi rtsa la'o //
translated: The eye, in the eye-vein.🔽When the water is cut off,

original: chu ni chad gyur na zhes bya ba ni mig chu dang mchi ma med cing skam por gyur pa'o //
analyzed: chu ni chad gyur na zhes bya ba ni mig chu dang mchi ma med cing skam por gyur pa'o //
translated: means when the eye-water and tears are absent and dry up.

original: steng du bltas zhes bya ba ni mig gi rtsa de chad pa'i tshe steng du blta ba'o //
analyzed: steng du bltas zhes bya ba ni mig gi rtsa de chad pa'i tshe steng du blta ba'o //
translated: Looking up means when that eye-vein is cut, looking up.

original: cha shas bcu zhes bya ba ni yi ge li'o //
analyzed: cha shas bcu zhes bya ba ni yi ge li'o //
translated: The ten parts means the letter li.

original: rna ba g-yon dang 'gram pa'i zhes bya ba ni go d'a ba ri'i ming can gyi rna ba g-yon pa'i 'og 'gram pa'i phyi rol gyi rna rtsa'i rtsa ste /
analyzed: rna ba g-yon dang 'gram pa'i zhes bya ba ni go d'a ba ri'i ming can gyi rna ba g-yon pa'i 'og 'gram pa'i phyi rol gyi rna rtsa'i rtsa ste /
translated: The left ear and cheek means the vein of the ear-lobe outside the cheek below the left ear named godāvarī.

original: de chad na nyin zhag gcig las mi 'tsho'o //
analyzed: de chad na nyin zhag gcig las mi 'tsho'o //
translated: When that is cut, one does not live more than one day.

original: cha shas bcu gcig ces bya ba ni yi ge ae'o //
analyzed: cha shas bcu gcig ces bya ba ni yi ge ae'o //
translated: The eleven parts are the letter E.

original: rna pa g-yas par brten pa zhes bya ba ni rna ba g-yas kyi 'og 'gram pa'i ngos rna rtsa'i rtsa ste /
analyzed: rna pa g-yas par brten pa zhes bya ba ni rna ba g-yas kyi 'og 'gram pa'i ngos rna rtsa'i rtsa ste /
translated: The one based in the right ear is the nāḍī in the right ear, below the ear, on the side of the cheek.

original: de chad pa'i tshe 'gram pa'i mtshams 'bye zhing ri mo snang par 'gyur @131a * //
analyzed: de chad pa'i tshe 'gram pa'i mtshams 'bye zhing ri mo snang par 'gyur @131a * //
translated: When it is cut, the side of the cheek splits open and a line appears.

original: ro ; / de ltar g-yon pa la yang sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: ro ; / de ltar g-yon pa la yang sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: The same should be applied to the left.

original: nyen zhag bco brgyad dag na 'chad //
analyzed: nyen zhag bco brgyad dag na 'chad //
translated: When eighteen days have passed, it is cut.

original: ces bya ba ni gri lngar srog gcod par byed pa'i rtsa'o //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni gri lngar srog gcod par byed pa'i rtsa'o //
translated: The nāḍī that kills in five days is the one that is cut.

original: cha shas bcu gnyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa la cha shas bcu gnyis ni yi ge ae'o //
analyzed: cha shas bcu gnyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa la cha shas bcu gnyis ni yi ge ae'o //
translated: The twelve parts are the letter E.

original: lce'i skud pa gnag mthong na //
analyzed: lce'i skud pa gnag mthong na //
translated: When the tongue thread is seen black,

original: zhes bya ba ni lce la gnas pa'i rtsa 'chad par gyur na lce'i skud pa ste lce'i rtse mo'i steng gi ri mo nag por 'gyur ba'o //🔽dus kyi nyin zhag ces bya ba ni nyi ma drug na'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni lce la gnas pa'i rtsa 'chad par gyur na lce'i skud pa ste lce'i rtse mo'i steng gi ri mo nag por 'gyur ba'o // dus kyi nyin zhag ces bya ba ni nyi ma drug na'o //
translated: when the nāḍī located in the tongue is cut, the tongue thread, the line on the tip of the tongue, becomes black.🔽The time is six days.

original: kha cig ni zhag drug na'o zhes zer ro //
analyzed: kha cig ni zhag drug na'o zhes zer ro //
translated: Some say it is six days.

original: cha shas bcu gsum zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: cha shas bcu gsum zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: The thirteen parts, etc.

original: cha shas bcu gsum ni yi ge ao'o //
analyzed: cha shas bcu gsum ni yi ge ao'o //
translated: The thirteen parts are the syllable OM.🔽Likewise, the blazing above, etc.

original: de bzhin du steng du 'bar ba'i zhes bya ba ni so'i mtshams na gnas pa'i rtsa de ni 'bar ba'i sgo zhes bya bar grags pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du steng du 'bar ba'i zhes bya ba ni so'i mtshams na gnas pa'i rtsa de ni 'bar ba'i sgo zhes bya bar grags pa'o //
translated: The channel located between the teeth is known as the door of blazing.

original: 'byung ba dag ni ma lus 'dren //
analyzed: 'byung ba dag ni ma lus 'dren //
translated: It draws up the elements without exception.

original: zhes bya ba ni rtsa de 'byung ba chan po bzhi 'jug pa'i lam yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rtsa de 'byung ba chan po bzhi 'jug pa'i lam yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because that channel is the path for the entry of the four great elements.

original: steng 'og so ni thams gyur na //
analyzed: steng 'og so ni thams gyur na //
translated: When the upper and lower teeth are all gone,

original: zhes bya ba ni so'i mtshams kyi rtsa de chad pa'i tshe steng 'og gi so'i phreng ba gnyis 'thams shing mi phyed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni so'i mtshams kyi rtsa de chad pa'i tshe steng 'og gi so'i phreng ba gnyis 'thams shing mi phyed par 'gyur ro //
translated: when that channel between the teeth is severed, the two rows of upper and lower teeth are joined and do not fall out.

original: dus grangs nyi mas 'gro zhes bya bas na nyi ma drug na'o //
analyzed: dus grangs nyi mas 'gro zhes bya bas na nyi ma drug na'o //
translated: It moves with the number of days of the sun.

original: kha cig ni nyin zhag gsum na'o zhes zer ro //
analyzed: kha cig ni nyin zhag gsum na'o zhes zer ro //
translated: Some say it is after three days.

original: dbyangs yig bcu bzhi zhes bya ba ni yi ge aoo ste cha shas bcu bzhi zhes bya bar spyar ro //
analyzed: dbyangs yig bcu bzhi zhes bya ba ni yi ge aoo ste cha shas bcu bzhi zhes bya bar spyar ro //
translated: The fourteenth vowel is the syllable OM. The fourteen parts are to be supplied.

original: steng du bltas pa zhas grags pa //
analyzed: steng du bltas pa zhas grags pa //
translated: The two channels that are located in front of the throat, outside, are called “looking upward.”

original: zhes bya ba ni mgrin pa'i phyi rol mdun gyi glo na gnas pa'i rtsa gnyis po de chad pa na steng du blta bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni mgrin pa'i phyi rol mdun gyi glo na gnas pa'i rtsa gnyis po de chad pa na steng du blta bar 'gyur te /
translated: When they are severed, they become “looking upward.”

original: de'i tshe dbugs rtseg par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i tshe dbugs rtseg par 'gyur ro //
translated: At that time, the breath becomes labored.

original: cha shas bco lnga pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: cha shas bco lnga pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: The fifteenth part, etc.

original: cha shas bco lnga ni yi ge aam ngo //
analyzed: cha shas bco lnga ni yi ge aam ngo //
translated: The fifteenth part is the letter A.

original: steng du bltas pa ni bshad zin to //
analyzed: steng du bltas pa ni bshad zin to //
translated: “Looking upward” has been explained.

original: brang gi dra ba zhom gyur na //
analyzed: brang gi dra ba zhom gyur na //
translated: When the chest-cage is sunken,

original: zhes bya ba ni brang gi dra ba la gnas pa'i rtsa de chad pa na brang gi dra ba dma' zhing zhom par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni brang gi dra ba la gnas pa'i rtsa de chad pa na brang gi dra ba dma' zhing zhom par 'gyur ro //
translated: when the channel located in the chest-cage is severed, the chest-cage becomes low and sunken.

original: zla ba phyed na gdon mi za //
analyzed: zla ba phyed na gdon mi za //
translated: In half a month, there is no doubt.

original: zhes bya ba la gdon mi za ba ni des pa ste 'chi bar 'gyur ba ces bya ba'i lhag ma yin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la gdon mi za ba ni des pa ste 'chi bar 'gyur ba ces bya ba'i lhag ma yin no //
translated: “Doubt” means certainty, and the rest is understood as “death.”

original: cha shas bcu drug zhes bya ba ni dbyangs yig bcu drug pa aa:'o //
analyzed: cha shas bcu drug zhes bya ba ni dbyangs yig bcu drug pa aa:'o //
translated: The sixteenth part is the sixteenth vowel, A.

original: rdzogs pa zhes bya ba ni mthar gyur pa'o //
analyzed: rdzogs pa zhes bya ba ni mthar gyur pa'o //
translated: “Complete” means final.

original: sen mo'i khrag ni med gyur na //
analyzed: sen mo'i khrag ni med gyur na //
translated: When the blood in the nails is gone,

original: zhes bya ba ni lte ba'i dbus na gnas pa'i rtsa chad par gyur pa'i tshe dbugs mi thon pa dang sen mo khrag med pa ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni lte ba'i dbus na gnas pa'i rtsa chad par gyur pa'i tshe dbugs mi thon pa dang sen mo khrag med pa ste /
translated: When the nāḍī located in the center of the navel is severed, there is no exhalation and the blood in the nails disappears.

original: sen mo'i mdog med cing skya bor gyur pa zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
analyzed: sen mo'i mdog med cing skya bor gyur pa zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
translated: The color of the nails disappears and they become pale.

original: nyin zhag bcu na yang dag nyal //
analyzed: nyin zhag bcu na yang dag nyal //
translated: After ten days, one sleeps well.

original: zhes bya ba ni nyi ma bcu'i mthar yang dag nyal @131b te legs par nyal zhing 'chi bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni nyi ma bcu'i mthar yang dag nyal @131b te legs par nyal zhing 'chi bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: After ten days, one sleeps well, that is, one dies well.

original: slar yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: slar yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: Again, when the blood in the knees is gone,

original: cha shas bcu bdun zhes bya ba ni thig le'o //
analyzed: cha shas bcu bdun zhes bya ba ni thig le'o //
translated: The “seventeen parts” are the drops.

original: brla'i mtshan ma zhes bya ba ni brla la gnas pa'i rtsa de chad pa na dbugs steng du 'gro zhing rgyu ba mi bde bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: brla'i mtshan ma zhes bya ba ni brla la gnas pa'i rtsa de chad pa na dbugs steng du 'gro zhing rgyu ba mi bde bar 'gyur ro //
translated: The “sign of the thigh” is the nāḍī located in the thigh. When it is severed, the breath moves upward and the movement is uncomfortable.

original: cha shas bco brgyad ces bya ba ni thig le'i steng na gnas pa'i ri mo'o //🔽byin pa la ni gnas pa'i rtsa //
analyzed: cha shas bco brgyad ces bya ba ni thig le'i steng na gnas pa'i ri mo'o //🔽byin pa la ni gnas pa'i rtsa //
translated: The “eighteen parts” are the lines located above the drops.🔽The nāḍī located in the calf

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: and so on.

original: byin pa la gnas pa'i rtsa chad pa na byin pa mi theg cing rengs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: byin pa la gnas pa'i rtsa chad pa na byin pa mi theg cing rengs par 'gyur ro //
translated: When the channel located in the perineum is cut, one cannot hold urine and becomes paralyzed.

original: cha shas nyi shu zhes bya ba ni bcu dang gnyis te /
analyzed: cha shas nyi shu zhes bya ba ni bcu dang gnyis te /
translated: Twenty parts means ten and two.

original: 'og nas 'byung ba'i bcu gnyis pa zhes bya ba dang mthun par sbyar ro //
analyzed: 'og nas 'byung ba'i bcu gnyis pa zhes bya ba dang mthun par sbyar ro //
translated: It is to be connected with the twelve that will be mentioned below.

original: de yang 'dir ao gzung bar bya'o //
analyzed: de yang 'dir ao gzung bar bya'o //
translated: And here the vowel o is to be taken.

original: chu so de bzhin steng bltas pa //
analyzed: chu so de bzhin steng bltas pa //
translated: The urinary duct is the same, looking upward.

original: zhes bya ba ni chu so la gnas pa'i rtsa chad pa na chu so'i tshangs pa'i skud pa mi mthong bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni chu so la gnas pa'i rtsa chad pa na chu so'i tshangs pa'i skud pa mi mthong bar 'gyur ro //
translated: When the channel located in the urinary duct is cut, the urinary cord of Brahma is not seen.

original: bcu gnyis zhes bya ba ni cha shas bcu drug pa gzung bar bya'o //
analyzed: bcu gnyis zhes bya ba ni cha shas bcu drug pa gzung bar bya'o //
translated: Twelve is to be taken as the sixteenth part.

original: lhag ma ni go sla'o //
analyzed: lhag ma ni go sla'o //
translated: The rest is easy to understand.

original: re'u mig bcu gnyis brtsis pa la //
analyzed: re'u mig bcu gnyis brtsis pa la //
translated: Counting the twelve squares,

original: zhes bya ba ni dus kyi 'khor lo bri ba ste sngar bshad zin to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni dus kyi 'khor lo bri ba ste sngar bshad zin to //
translated: means drawing the Wheel of Time, as explained above.

original: bdun cu rtsa gnyis rim pa dang // zhes bya ba la lo gcig gi zla ba bcu gnyis su chad pa la zla ba re re zhing zhag drug dbri bar bya ba yin te /
analyzed: bdun cu rtsa gnyis rim pa dang // zhes bya ba la lo gcig gi zla ba bcu gnyis su chad pa la zla ba re re zhing zhag drug dbri bar bya ba yin te /
translated: In the twelve months of a year, each month is to be reduced by six days.

original: 'di ltar zla ba yar ngo la tshes bcu gsum dang / bcu bzhi dang / nya'i nyi ma rnams tshes gsum dang / bzhi dang / lnga las gung du bgrang bar mi bya ba dang / de bzhin du /
analyzed: 'di ltar zla ba yar ngo la tshes bcu gsum dang / bcu bzhi dang / nya'i nyi ma rnams tshes gsum dang / bzhi dang / lnga las gung du bgrang bar mi bya ba dang / de bzhin du /
translated: Thus, in the bright fortnight, the thirteenth, fourteenth, and fifteenth days are not to be counted as the third, fourth, and fifth days, respectively.

original: zla ba ngo'i cog gi mar ngo la yang mar ngo'i bcu gsum dang / bcu bzhi dang / gnam stong gi nyi ma rnams mar ngo'i tshes gsum dang / tshes bzhi dang / tshes lnga las gung du bgrang bar mi bya ste /
analyzed: zla ba ngo'i cog gi mar ngo la yang mar ngo'i bcu gsum dang / bcu bzhi dang / gnam stong gi nyi ma rnams mar ngo'i tshes gsum dang / tshes bzhi dang / tshes lnga las gung du bgrang bar mi bya ste /
translated: Similarly, in the dark fortnight, the thirteenth, fourteenth, and thirtieth days of the dark fortnight are not to be counted as the third, fourth, and fifth days of the dark fortnight, respectively.

original: de ltar na lo gcig la zhag bdun cu rtsa gnyis dbri ba'i don to //
analyzed: de ltar na lo gcig la zhag bdun cu rtsa gnyis dbri ba'i don to //
translated: Thus, it means that seventy-two days are subtracted from a year.

original: da ni lo dang zhag gi dbugs dang chu tshod kyi grangs nges pa slar yang bstan pa'i phyir //
analyzed: da ni lo dang zhag gi dbugs dang chu tshod kyi grangs nges pa slar yang bstan pa'i phyir //
translated: Now, in order to again teach the definite number of breaths and hours in a year and day, it is said:

original: sum cu rtsa drug bco brgyad kyi //
analyzed: sum cu rtsa drug bco brgyad kyi //
translated: Thirty-six, eighteen,

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: Thus it is said.🔽

original: 'di ltar sum cu rtsa drug gi mtshan ma dum bu gnyis su bgos pas bco brgyad kyi mtshan ma gnyis su bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar sum cu rtsa drug gi mtshan ma dum bu gnyis su bgos pas bco brgyad kyi mtshan ma gnyis su bya'o //
translated: Thus, the thirty-six signs are divided into two parts, and the eighteen signs are made into two.

original: de la bcu phrag gnyis kyi mtshan ma gcig tu gud du byas la /
analyzed: de la bcu phrag gnyis kyi mtshan ma gcig tu gud du byas la /
translated: Therein, the signs of the two tens are made into one,

original: brgya phrag gnyis bsdoms pa'i mtshan ma yang de'i drung du bri ste /
analyzed: brgya phrag gnyis bsdoms pa'i mtshan ma yang de'i drung du bri ste /
translated: and the signs of the two hundreds are added to that.

original: de'i glor thig le lnga pa gnyis po sbreng ba'i tshul du bzhag na nyi khri chig stong drug brgya'i grangs kyi mtshan mar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i glor thig le lnga pa gnyis po sbreng ba'i tshul du bzhag na nyi khri chig stong drug brgya'i grangs kyi mtshan mar 'gyur ro //
translated: If two fives are placed in the middle of that, in the manner of a garland, it becomes the sign of the number twenty-one thousand six hundred.🔽The rest is easy to understand.

original: lhag ma ni go sla'o zhes bya ba ni yongs su rdzogs pa'i tshig go //
analyzed: lhag ma ni go sla'o zhes bya ba ni yongs su rdzogs pa'i tshig go //
translated: This is the complete statement.

original: @132a * // rtsa dang mnyam par sbyor ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa la rtsa'i mnyam par sbyor ba ni rtsa rnams kyi cha ji ltar gnas pa'o //
analyzed: @132a * // rtsa dang mnyam par sbyor ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa la rtsa'i mnyam par sbyor ba ni rtsa rnams kyi cha ji ltar gnas pa'o //
translated: The union with the channels, etc. The union with the channels is the parts of the channels, just as they are situated.

original: dbugs 'byung ba zhes bya ba ni nyi ma drug la sogs pa'i dbugs kyi rgyu ba'o //
analyzed: dbugs 'byung ba zhes bya ba ni nyi ma drug la sogs pa'i dbugs kyi rgyu ba'o //
translated: The exhalation is the movement of the breath for six days, etc.

original: cho ga ni de ston par byed pa'i rim par phye ba nyid do //
analyzed: cho ga ni de ston par byed pa'i rim par phye ba nyid do //
translated: The rite is the very division of the stages that teach that.

original: gnyis par na rtsa dang mnyam par sbyor ba ni sna la gnas pa'i rtsa la sogs pa chad pas sna yon por gyur pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma ni rtsa dang mnyam par sbyor ba'o //
analyzed: gnyis par na rtsa dang mnyam par sbyor ba ni sna la gnas pa'i rtsa la sogs pa chad pas sna yon por gyur pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma ni rtsa dang mnyam par sbyor ba'o //
translated: In the second, the union with the nāḍīs is the sign of the crooked nose, and so on, due to the severed nāḍīs located in the nose, and so on.

original: lhag ma ni snga ma bzhin te rim par phye ba nyi shu ba'o //
analyzed: lhag ma ni snga ma bzhin te rim par phye ba nyi shu ba'o //
translated: The rest is the same as before.

original: rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i rnam par bshad pa las le'u nyi shu ba'i rnam par bshad pa'o //🔽da ni 'chi ba'i mtshan ma shes su zin kyang gang gi tshe ltas ngan bzlog par mi nus pa de'i tshe gong du 'pho zhing rnam par shes pas lus btang nas gnas khyad par can du skye bar bya ba'i phyir 'chi ltas kyi yan lag dang nying lag
analyzed: rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i rnam par bshad pa las le'u nyi shu ba'i rnam par bshad pa'o // da ni 'chi ba'i mtshan ma shes su zin kyang gang gi tshe ltas ngan bzlog par mi nus pa de'i tshe gong du 'pho zhing rnam par shes pas lus btang nas gnas khyad par can du skye bar bya ba'i phyir 'chi ltas kyi yan lag dang nying lag
translated: This is the twentieth chapter of the commentary on the glorious Vajraḍāka, the king of tantras.

original: thams cad bshad nas /
analyzed: thams cad bshad nas /
translated: Now, although one may know the signs of death, when it is not possible to avert the bad omen, then, in order to transfer to a higher realm and, having abandoned the body with consciousness, to be reborn in a special place, all the major and minor signs of death are explained.

original: gong du 'pho ba'i yan lag dang nyid lag thams cad bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: gong du 'pho ba'i yan lag dang nyid lag thams cad bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to teach all the branches and sub-branches of upward transference,

original: sgo dgu po yi mtshan nyid dang // zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: sgo dgu po yi mtshan nyid dang // zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: [the Bhagavān] declares, “The characteristics of the nine doors,” and so on.

original: de la sgo dgu zhes bya ba ni lte ba la sogs pa'i sgo dgu'o //
analyzed: de la sgo dgu zhes bya ba ni lte ba la sogs pa'i sgo dgu'o //
translated: Therein, the “nine doors” are the nine doors of the navel and so on.

original: mtshan nyid ni rang bzhin no //
analyzed: mtshan nyid ni rang bzhin no //
translated: “Characteristics” are natures.

original: rtsa ni mngon par gnas pa'i zhes bya ba ni sgo yangs pa'i sgo dgu'i rtsa'o //
analyzed: rtsa ni mngon par gnas pa'i zhes bya ba ni sgo yangs pa'i sgo dgu'i rtsa'o //
translated: “The nāḍīs are situated” means the nāḍīs of the nine doors of the open doors.

original: yon tan skyon rnams ji ltar blta //
analyzed: yon tan skyon rnams ji ltar blta //
translated: “How are the qualities and faults seen?”

original: zhes bya ba ni sgo de rnams kyis 'gro ba dang 'ong ba'i skyon yin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sgo de rnams kyis 'gro ba dang 'ong ba'i skyon yin no //
translated: means the faults of coming and going through those doors.

original: de rnams zhes bya ba ni sgo yangs pa de rnams kyi'o //
analyzed: de rnams zhes bya ba ni sgo yangs pa de rnams kyi'o //
translated: “Those” are the open doors.

original: bye brag ni phan tshun gyi khyad par ro //
analyzed: bye brag ni phan tshun gyi khyad par ro //
translated: “Distinction” is the difference between them.

original: ye shes dbang la zhes bya ba ni gong du 'pho ba la sogs pa'i ye shes kyi dbang phyug la ste bod pa'o //
analyzed: ye shes dbang la zhes bya ba ni gong du 'pho ba la sogs pa'i ye shes kyi dbang phyug la ste bod pa'o //
translated: “The lord of the gnosis” is the lord of the gnosis of upward transference, and so on.

original: lan gsungs pa gong du 'pho ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: lan gsungs pa gong du 'pho ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: The reply is stated: “Upward transference,” and so on.

original: sngon du bdag nyid sbyangs byas la //
analyzed: sngon du bdag nyid sbyangs byas la //
translated: First one should purify oneself.

original: zhes bya ba ni gong du 'pho ba'i dngos grub kyi phyir dang po bdag nyid kyi lus gtum mo'i rnal 'byor gyis sbyangs la khams mnyam pa nyid du bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni gong du 'pho ba'i dngos grub kyi phyir dang po bdag nyid kyi lus gtum mo'i rnal 'byor gyis sbyangs la khams mnyam pa nyid du bya'o //
translated: This is for the sake of the power of upward transference. First, one should purify one's body by the yoga of fierce woman and equalize the elements.

original: phyi nas las ni brtsam par bya ba ni sbyangs kyi 'og tu gong du 'pho ba'i las brtsam par bya ste /
analyzed: phyi nas las ni brtsam par bya ba ni sbyangs kyi 'og tu gong du 'pho ba'i las brtsam par bya ste /
translated: Then, one should undertake the rite. After purification, one should undertake the rite of upward transference.

original: dper na zhing sa legs par byi dor byas nas sa bon bzang po btab na nges par 'bras bu smin par 'gyur ba bzhin du blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: dper na zhing sa legs par byi dor byas nas sa bon bzang po btab na nges par 'bras bu smin par 'gyur ba bzhin du blta bar bya'o //
translated: It should be seen as like a field that is well tilled and sown with good seed, where the fruit is certain to ripen.

original: rnal 'byor de gsungs pa /
analyzed: rnal 'byor de gsungs pa /
translated: The yoga is stated:

original: gzugs med ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: gzugs med ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: Formless, etc.

original: gzugs med gnas pa zhes bya ba ni bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo ste /
analyzed: gzugs med gnas pa zhes bya ba ni bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo ste /
translated: The abode of the formless is the wheel of great bliss.

original: lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'i @132b rang bzhin yin pas brjod du med pa'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'i @132b rang bzhin yin pas brjod du med pa'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir te /
translated: It is the nature of innate joy, because it is of the nature of the inexpressible,

original: gzugs ni brjod pa'i ngo bo nyid du 'dod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzugs ni brjod pa'i ngo bo nyid du 'dod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because form is asserted to be of the nature of the expressible.

original: mdog sngo ba yi padma che //
analyzed: mdog sngo ba yi padma che //
translated: The lotus is large, blue in color.

original: zhes bya ba ni mgo'i nang du bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo padma 'dab ma sum cu rtsa gnyis pa sngon po'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni mgo'i nang du bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo padma 'dab ma sum cu rtsa gnyis pa sngon po'o //
translated: This is the great-bliss wheel in the head, a lotus with thirty-two petals, blue in color.🔽It drips like the moon,

original: zla ba lta bur 'dzag ces bya ba ni de'i dbus su ham dkar po kha thur du bltas te bdud rtsi 'dzag pa'o //
analyzed: zla ba lta bur 'dzag ces bya ba ni de'i dbus su ham dkar po kha thur du bltas te bdud rtsi 'dzag pa'o //
translated: in the middle of which is an inverted white haṃ, dripping nectar.

original: slar yang gzugs su gnas pa ste //
analyzed: slar yang gzugs su gnas pa ste //
translated: Again, it abides in the form,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i 'khor lo bstan pa yin te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i 'khor lo bstan pa yin te /
translated: and so forth. This teaches the enjoyment wheel.

original: de la gzugs zhes bya ba ni brjod pa'i ngo bo nyid yin te /
analyzed: de la gzugs zhes bya ba ni brjod pa'i ngo bo nyid yin te /
translated: There, the form is the nature of expression.

original: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i 'khor lo khyad par gyi dga' ba'i rang bzhin yin pas mgrin par gnas nas sgra rjod par byed pa zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
analyzed: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i 'khor lo khyad par gyi dga' ba'i rang bzhin yin pas mgrin par gnas nas sgra rjod par byed pa zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
translated: Since the enjoyment wheel is the nature of special joy, it abides in the throat and expresses sound.

original: rnam pa kun gyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: rnam pa kun gyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba la /
translated: It is adorned with all aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad ni mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu ste longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku de thob par dgongs so //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad ni mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu ste longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku de thob par dgongs so //
translated: All aspects are the thirty-two major marks and the eighty minor marks.

original: cha shas bzhi zhes bya ba ni a'a a'i a'u aee ste dbyangs kyi yi ge bzhi'o //
analyzed: cha shas bzhi zhes bya ba ni a'a a'i a'u aee ste dbyangs kyi yi ge bzhi'o //
translated: The four parts are the four vowel sounds a ā i ī.

original: yang dag ldan zhes bya ba ni shar la sogs pa'i phyogs su gnas pa dang nye bar ldan pa'i aom mo //
analyzed: yang dag ldan zhes bya ba ni shar la sogs pa'i phyogs su gnas pa dang nye bar ldan pa'i aom mo //
translated: The one endowed with the perfect is the syllable oṃ, which is located in the east and the other directions.

original: kha ni thur du bltas te 'phyang //
analyzed: kha ni thur du bltas te 'phyang //
translated: The mouth is hanging downward.

original: zhes bya ba ni bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo'i khyad par te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo'i khyad par te /
translated: This is the special feature of the great-bliss wheel.

original: mgo bo'i cha la brten nas kha 'og tu blta ba'o //
analyzed: mgo bo'i cha la brten nas kha 'og tu blta ba'o //
translated: It is located in the head region and faces downward.

original: yang na 'phyang ba'i kha 'og tu bltas te bdud rtsi 'dzag pa'o //
analyzed: yang na 'phyang ba'i kha 'og tu bltas te bdud rtsi 'dzag pa'o //
translated: Or else, the mouth is hanging downward, dripping nectar.

original: 'dir longs spyod rdzogs pa'i 'khor ni mdog dmar zhing sa bon dkar ba'o //
analyzed: 'dir longs spyod rdzogs pa'i 'khor ni mdog dmar zhing sa bon dkar ba'o //
translated: Here the retinue of the enjoyment wheel is red in color and has a white seed syllable.

original: go 'phang zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni chos kyi 'khor lo ston te chos thams cad khong du chud pa'i rang bzhin yin pas go 'phang ni shes pa'o //
analyzed: go 'phang zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni chos kyi 'khor lo ston te chos thams cad khong du chud pa'i rang bzhin yin pas go 'phang ni shes pa'o //
translated: The phrase “the wheel of Dharma” indicates the wheel of Dharma, since it is the nature of the realization of all dharmas.

original: gnas ni de'i rten te chos kyi 'khor lo'o //
analyzed: gnas ni de'i rten te chos kyi 'khor lo'o //
translated: The “place” is the support of that, i.e., the wheel of Dharma.

original: yang na gnas zhes bya ba ni stobs bcu la sogs pa'i yon tan gyi rten no //
analyzed: yang na gnas zhes bya ba ni stobs bcu la sogs pa'i yon tan gyi rten no //
