translated: The upper root is a particular of that lotus.

original: rtsa ba steng du zug pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rtsa ba steng du zug pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it penetrates upward.

original: bza' bar bya ba ni de'i bdud rtsi la longs spyod pa'o //
analyzed: bza' bar bya ba ni de'i bdud rtsi la longs spyod pa'o //
translated: The food is the enjoyment of its nectar.

original: rnam pa gzhan gsungs pa /
analyzed: rnam pa gzhan gsungs pa /
translated: Another aspect is stated:

original: chu dang skya rengs ldan pa dag / ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: chu dang skya rengs ldan pa dag / ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: The one endowed with water and dawn, etc.

original: chu zhes bya ba ni byang chub kyi sems so //
analyzed: chu zhes bya ba ni byang chub kyi sems so //
translated: Water is the bodhicitta.

original: skya rengs zhes bya ba ni lud pa'o //
analyzed: skya rengs zhes bya ba ni lud pa'o //
translated: Dawn is the mucus.

original: g-yon pa'i bdud rtsi zhes bya ba ni me tog go //
analyzed: g-yon pa'i bdud rtsi zhes bya ba ni me tog go //
translated: The nectar of the left is the flower.

original: sbyar byas la zhes bya ba ni rdzas gsum po de dag cha mnyam ste sbyar nas tho rangs kyi dus su rgyun du bza' bar bya'o //
analyzed: sbyar byas la zhes bya ba ni rdzas gsum po de dag cha mnyam ste sbyar nas tho rangs kyi dus su rgyun du bza' bar bya'o //
translated: Having mixed the three substances equally, one should eat them at dawn.

original: kha cig ni steng gi rtsa ba zhes bya ba ni zla ba brgyad pa'i lto skyes kyi @138b sha ste /
analyzed: kha cig ni steng gi rtsa ba zhes bya ba ni zla ba brgyad pa'i lto skyes kyi @138b sha ste /
translated: Some say that the upper root is the womb-born of the eighth month.

original: de dang me tog la sogs pa'i rdzas su bsres te bza' 'o zhes zer ro //
analyzed: de dang me tog la sogs pa'i rdzas su bsres te bza' 'o zhes zer ro //
translated: That is mixed with the substances of the flower, etc., and eaten.

original: zos na zhi dang rgyas pa ste //
analyzed: zos na zhi dang rgyas pa ste //
translated: When eaten, there is peace and increase.

original: zhes bya ba ni phyi rol gyi zhi ba la sog spa'i las 'grub pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni phyi rol gyi zhi ba la sog spa'i las 'grub pa'o //
translated: This is the accomplishment of external pacification, etc.

original: yang na nad la sogs pa zhi ba dang / tshe dang na so la sogs pa 'phel ba'o //
analyzed: yang na nad la sogs pa zhi ba dang / tshe dang na so la sogs pa 'phel ba'o //
translated: Or, it is the pacification of disease, etc. and the increase of life, youth, etc.

original: sbyor ba zhes bya ba ni bcud kyis len no //
analyzed: sbyor ba zhes bya ba ni bcud kyis len no //
translated: The application is the elixir.

original: rnyings dang smin ma 'joms par byed //🔽ces bya ba la /
analyzed: rnyings dang smin ma 'joms par byed // ces bya ba la /
translated: It destroys old age and wrinkles.🔽In the phrase old age and wrinkles,

original: rnyings pa ni gnyer ma la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: rnyings pa ni gnyer ma la sogs pa'o //
translated: old age is the wrinkles, etc.

original: smin ma ni skra dkar ro //
analyzed: smin ma ni skra dkar ro //
translated: Wrinkles are the gray hair.

original: nam mkhar 'phur ba'i bsgrub pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: nam mkhar 'phur ba'i bsgrub pa gsungs pa /
translated: The accomplishment of flying in the sky is stated:

original: lha mo zhes bya ba la sogs pa slar yang bzlog pa yis zhes bya ba ni rnam pa gzhan ston par byed pa'i tshig phrad do //
analyzed: lha mo zhes bya ba la sogs pa slar yang bzlog pa yis zhes bya ba ni rnam pa gzhan ston par byed pa'i tshig phrad do //
translated: The goddess, etc. Again is a conjunction that introduces another aspect.

original: rlung dang me yi bye brag gis //🔽zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: rlung dang me yi bye brag gis // zhes bya ba la /
translated: By the distinction of wind and fire,

original: rlung ni rlung gi dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: rlung ni rlung gi dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: wind is the wind maṇḍala.

original: me ni me'i dkyil 'khor te /
analyzed: me ni me'i dkyil 'khor te /
translated: Fire is the fire maṇḍala.

original: dbyibs gzhu lta bu dang / gru gsum gyi tshul du so sor bsgom pa ni bye brag go //
analyzed: dbyibs gzhu lta bu dang / gru gsum gyi tshul du so sor bsgom pa ni bye brag go //
translated: The distinction is the meditation on the shape of the bow and the triangle.

original: rkang pa'i 'khor lor dran par bya //
analyzed: rkang pa'i 'khor lor dran par bya //
translated: One should recollect the wheel on the foot.

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: Thus.

original: rkang pa ni rkang pa'i 'og tu'o //
analyzed: rkang pa ni rkang pa'i 'og tu'o //
translated: The foot is below the foot.

original: dran pa ni bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: dran pa ni bsgom pa'o //
translated: The mindfulness is the cultivation.

original: yid kyis rab tu zhir sbyar nas //
analyzed: yid kyis rab tu zhir sbyar nas //
translated: Having applied the mind to peace,

original: zhes bya ba ni rang gi lus 'od tsam gyis lus la bdag med cing mig yor lta bur bsgom par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rang gi lus 'od tsam gyis lus la bdag med cing mig yor lta bur bsgom par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: one should cultivate the body as just light, without self, like a reflection.

original: nam mkhar 'phur ba'i 'bras bu gsungs pa /
analyzed: nam mkhar 'phur ba'i 'bras bu gsungs pa /
translated: The result of flying in the sky is stated:

original: mkha' 'gro kun gyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro kun gyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
translated: All dakinis, etc. , is easy to understand.

original: nang gi ngag gi dngos grub gsungs pa /
analyzed: nang gi ngag gi dngos grub gsungs pa /
translated: The inner power of speech is stated:

original: slar yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa la lugs las bzlog pa zhes bya ba ni sngar bshad pa bzhin no //🔽kha dog dkar po'i padma bsam //
analyzed: slar yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa la lugs las bzlog pa zhes bya ba ni sngar bshad pa bzhin no // kha dog dkar po'i padma bsam //
translated: Again, etc. , the reverse order is as explained before.🔽One should imagine a white lotus.

original: zhes bya ba ni bsgrub par bya ba'i snying gar padma dkar po bsams la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bsgrub par bya ba'i snying gar padma dkar po bsams la /
translated: One should imagine a white lotus in the heart of the one to be accomplished.

original: de'i steng du rnam par shes pa'i h'um bkod de sngar bshad pa bzhin tsanda l'i'i sa bon gyi rang gi snying gar yang de bzhin du h'um gi sa bon bkod pa bskul la /
analyzed: de'i steng du rnam par shes pa'i h'um bkod de sngar bshad pa bzhin tsanda l'i'i sa bon gyi rang gi snying gar yang de bzhin du h'um gi sa bon bkod pa bskul la /
translated: On top of that, one should arrange the hūṃ of consciousness, and as explained before, one should also arrange the seed of Caṇḍālī at one’s heart.

original: de'i 'od zer gyis bsgrub par bya ba'i rnam par shes pa 'phrogs nas rang gi snying gar gzhug pa dang / rang rang gi rnam par shes pa yang bsgrub bya'i snying gar gzhug par bya'o //🔽de'i phyir / bsgrub bya'i dbus su sbyar nas ni //
analyzed: de'i 'od zer gyis bsgrub par bya ba'i rnam par shes pa 'phrogs nas rang gi snying gar gzhug pa dang / rang rang gi rnam par shes pa yang bsgrub bya'i snying gar gzhug par bya'o // de'i phyir / bsgrub bya'i dbus su sbyar nas ni //
translated: Having summoned that, one should draw in the consciousness of the victim with light rays from that, and one should also draw in one’s own consciousness into the heart of the victim.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: Therefore, it is said, “Having applied it to the heart of the victim,” and so on.

original: rtag tu ngag gis dngos grub byed //
analyzed: rtag tu ngag gis dngos grub byed //
translated: “Always accomplish with speech”

original: ces bya ba ni ngag tsam gyis dngos grub byed pa ste /
analyzed: ces bya ba ni ngag tsam gyis dngos grub byed pa ste /
translated: means that one accomplishes with speech alone.

original: tshegs med par grub pa'i don to //
analyzed: tshegs med par grub pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that one is accomplished without difficulty.

original: rlung gi dkyil 'khor 'khrug pa blta //
analyzed: rlung gi dkyil 'khor 'khrug pa blta //
translated: “One should see the disturbance of the maṇḍala of wind”

original: zhes bya ba ni rang gi rnam par shes pa @139a * //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rang gi rnam par shes pa @139a * //
translated: teaches that one should place one’s own consciousness

original: bsgrub bya'i snying gar gzhug pa ston pa yin te /
analyzed: bsgrub bya'i snying gar gzhug pa ston pa yin te /
translated: in the heart of the victim.

original: rang gi rnam par shes pa rlung gi dkyil 'khor 'khrug pa la zhon nas rang gi kha nas byung ste /
analyzed: rang gi rnam par shes pa rlung gi dkyil 'khor 'khrug pa la zhon nas rang gi kha nas byung ste /
translated: Having mounted his own consciousness on the circle of wind, he should emerge from his own mouth.

original: bsgrub bya'i khar zhugs nas snying ga'i padmar thim par bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: bsgrub bya'i khar zhugs nas snying ga'i padmar thim par bsgom par bya'o //
translated: Having entered the mouth of the victim, he should meditate on it dissolving into the lotus of his heart.

original: bsgrub par bya ba'i rnam shes dgug pa la yang de ltar blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba'i rnam shes dgug pa la yang de ltar blta bar bya'o //
translated: One should view the summoning of the consciousness of the victim in the same way.

original: rlung gi lam nas bsgrub bya'i lus la thim par gyur pa dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni sngar bstan pa'i nang gi bdag nyid kyi tshar bcad pa'i nye bar bsdu ba bstan pa yin te go sla'o //
analyzed: rlung gi lam nas bsgrub bya'i lus la thim par gyur pa dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni sngar bstan pa'i nang gi bdag nyid kyi tshar bcad pa'i nye bar bsdu ba bstan pa yin te go sla'o //
translated: “Having dissolved into the body of the victim through the path of the wind” and so forth teaches the summary of the inner subjugation taught previously. It is easy to understand.

original: tshigs dgu las ni zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gong du 'pho ba nye bar bsdu ba gsungs pa yin te /
analyzed: tshigs dgu las ni zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gong du 'pho ba nye bar bsdu ba gsungs pa yin te /
translated: “From the nine openings” and so forth teaches the summary of upward transference.

original: steng zhes bya ba ni steng gi sgo nas so //
analyzed: steng zhes bya ba ni steng gi sgo nas so //
translated: “Above” means through the upper door.

original: mod la zhes bya ba ni 'phral du'o //
analyzed: mod la zhes bya ba ni 'phral du'o //
translated: “Immediately” means instantly.

original: mchog ces bya ba ni dam pa'o //
analyzed: mchog ces bya ba ni dam pa'o //
translated: “Supreme” means highest.

original: steng du 'pho ba'i sngags pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: steng du 'pho ba'i sngags pa gsungs pa /
translated: The mantra practitioner of upward transference is taught.

original: lha dang bram ze gsod pa dang // zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: lha dang bram ze gsod pa dang // zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: Killing a god or a Brahmin, etc.

original: mtshams med pa lnga zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni ma gsod pa dang pha gsod pa dang dgra bcom pa gsod pa dang / dge 'dun 'byed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la ngan sems kyis khrag 'byin pa rnams te /
analyzed: mtshams med pa lnga zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni ma gsod pa dang pha gsod pa dang dgra bcom pa gsod pa dang / dge 'dun 'byed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la ngan sems kyis khrag 'byin pa rnams te /
translated: In the five heinous acts, etc., killing one's mother, killing one's father, killing an arhat, splitting the Buddhist order, and maliciously drawing blood from a Tathagata.

original: de dag byed pa'o //
analyzed: de dag byed pa'o //
translated: One who does these things.

original: rku 'phrog 'dod la spyod pa yang //
analyzed: rku 'phrog 'dod la spyod pa yang //
translated: Stealing, plundering, and indulging in desires.

original: zhes bya ba la rku 'phrog ni ma byin par len pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la rku 'phrog ni ma byin par len pa'o //
translated: Stealing and plundering are taking what is not given.

original: 'dod pa la spyod pa ni 'dod pa la log par g-yem pa la spyod pa'o //
analyzed: 'dod pa la spyod pa ni 'dod pa la log par g-yem pa la spyod pa'o //
translated: Indulging in desires is engaging in sexual misconduct.

original: lam 'di yis ni dag 'gyur te //
analyzed: lam 'di yis ni dag 'gyur te //
translated: By this path, one becomes pure.

original: zhes bya ba ni gong du 'pho ba'i lam 'dis sdig pa chen po byed pa de dag kyang dag cing grol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni gong du 'pho ba'i lam 'dis sdig pa chen po byed pa de dag kyang dag cing grol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This means that even those who commit great evil become pure and liberated by this path of upward transference.

original: kha cig las ni /
analyzed: kha cig las ni /
translated: In some texts, it is said:

original: nyin re bram ze gsod pa dang // zhes 'byung ste /
analyzed: nyin re bram ze gsod pa dang // zhes 'byung ste /
translated: Daily killing Brahmins.

original: rgyun du bram ze gsod pa'i sdig byed pa'o //
analyzed: rgyun du bram ze gsod pa'i sdig byed pa'o //
translated: He is always a sinner who kills Brahmins.

original: srid pa'i skyon las ring du 'gro //🔽zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: srid pa'i skyon las ring du 'gro // zhes bya ba la /
translated: He goes far from the faults of existence.

original: sdang zhing sun 'byin par byed pas ni srid pa'i skyon te nyon mongs pa'i sdig pa dang ngan 'gro'i skye ba'o //
analyzed: sdang zhing sun 'byin par byed pas ni srid pa'i skyon te nyon mongs pa'i sdig pa dang ngan 'gro'i skye ba'o //
translated: As for the faults of existence, they are the sins of the afflictions and the births in bad destinies.

original: rnam par dag pa'i dpe gsungs pa /
analyzed: rnam par dag pa'i dpe gsungs pa /
translated: The example of purification is stated

original: ji ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste go sla'o //
analyzed: ji ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste go sla'o //
translated: as in the verse beginning “Just as . . . ” and so on. It is easy to understand.

original: lus kyi 'dam las ni zhes bya ba ni las dang nyon mongs pa'i sdig las skyes pa'i lus so //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dam las ni zhes bya ba ni las dang nyon mongs pa'i sdig las skyes pa'i lus so //
translated: “From the mud of the body” means from the body born of the sins of karma and afflictions.

original: ye shes sku zhes bya ba ni ye shes kyi rang bzhin gyi sku ste 'jam dpal dang 'dra bar 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: ye shes sku zhes bya ba ni ye shes kyi rang bzhin gyi sku ste 'jam dpal dang 'dra bar 'gyur ba'o //
translated: “The body of wisdom” is the body whose nature is wisdom, which becomes like Manjusri.

original: de nyid kyi phyir 'dod bzhin 'gro zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir 'dod bzhin 'gro zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: Therefore, it is stated that “one goes as one wishes. ”

original: rang gi 'dod pa bzhin rgyu zhing spyod pa'o //
analyzed: rang gi 'dod pa bzhin rgyu zhing spyod pa'o //
translated: One goes and acts as one wishes.

original: gong du 'pho ba zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: gong du 'pho ba zhes bya ba la /
translated: As for “going to the highest, ”

original: gong du 'pho ba'i bsam gtan ni bdag nyid tshar gcod pa'i ting nge 'dzin @139b gyi bdag go //
analyzed: gong du 'pho ba'i bsam gtan ni bdag nyid tshar gcod pa'i ting nge 'dzin @139b gyi bdag go //
translated: The meditative concentration of upward transference is the meditative concentration of the self-perfected master.

original: seng ge rnam par rol pa'i phyag rgya ni go sla'o //
analyzed: seng ge rnam par rol pa'i phyag rgya ni go sla'o //
translated: The seal of the lion's play is easy to understand.

original: sbyor ba ni gzhan gyi rnam par shes pa dbrog pa la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin to /
analyzed: sbyor ba ni gzhan gyi rnam par shes pa dbrog pa la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin to /
translated: The application is the meditative concentration of stealing another's consciousness and so forth.

original: 'byung ba ni bstan pa'o //
analyzed: 'byung ba ni bstan pa'o //
translated: The emergence is the teaching.

original: de ston pa'i gzhung ni rim par phye ba ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o //
analyzed: de ston pa'i gzhung ni rim par phye ba ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o //
translated: The text that teaches that is the twenty-first chapter.

original: rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i rnam par bshad pa las le'u nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'i rnam par bshad pa /
analyzed: rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i rnam par bshad pa las le'u nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'i rnam par bshad pa /
translated: The explanation of the twenty-first chapter of the glorious Vajradaka, the great king of tantras, is finished.

original: // / brda ma rtogs par rnal 'byor pa dang rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi nang du tha snyad la 'jug par mi 'gyur bas gong du 'pho ba la sogs pa bstan pa'i 'og tu lag pa'i brda dang ngag gi brda gsungs pa /
analyzed: // / brda ma rtogs par rnal 'byor pa dang rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi nang du tha snyad la 'jug par mi 'gyur bas gong du 'pho ba la sogs pa bstan pa'i 'og tu lag pa'i brda dang ngag gi brda gsungs pa /
translated: Since without understanding the symbolic language one will not be able to engage in the conventions among yogins and yoginis, after teaching upward transference and so forth, the symbolic language of the hands and the symbolic language of speech are taught.

original: ngag gi phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid ni //
analyzed: ngag gi phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid ni //
translated: The characteristics of the seal of speech

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: In this and other such passages,

original: ngag ces bya ba ni ngag gi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: ngag ces bya ba ni ngag gi phyag rgya'o //
translated: speech is the speech-seal.

original: 'dis rnal 'byor pa dang rnal 'byor mar mtshon par byed pas na mtshan nyid de dag dang phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: 'dis rnal 'byor pa dang rnal 'byor mar mtshon par byed pas na mtshan nyid de dag dang phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid do //
translated: Since this indicates the yogin and yoginī, it is the characteristic of those and the characteristic of the seal.

original: g-yas kyi cha ru rnal 'byor pa //
analyzed: g-yas kyi cha ru rnal 'byor pa //
translated: The yogin on the right side

original: zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor pas g-yas kyi cha gtso bor byas nas phyag rgya bstan par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor pas g-yas kyi cha gtso bor byas nas phyag rgya bstan par bya'o //
translated: means that the yogin should display the seal, making the right side primary.

original: de bzhin du rnal 'byor mas ni g-yon gyi cha gtso bor byas nas bstan pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du rnal 'byor mas ni g-yon gyi cha gtso bor byas nas bstan pa'o //
translated: Similarly, the yoginī should display it, making the left side primary.

original: go ku zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor mas lag pa'i phyag rgya bstan pa'i 'og tu rnal 'byor mas go ku zhes bya ba'i ngag gi phyag rgya brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: go ku zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor mas lag pa'i phyag rgya bstan pa'i 'og tu rnal 'byor mas go ku zhes bya ba'i ngag gi phyag rgya brjod par bya'o //
translated: Go ku means that after the yoginī displays the hand seal, the yoginī should utter the speech seal called go ku.

original: mthe bong 'tshir bar byed pa zhes bya ba ni mthe bong chen po gnyis 'jib cing btung bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: mthe bong 'tshir bar byed pa zhes bya ba ni mthe bong chen po gnyis 'jib cing btung bar byed pa'o //
translated: The clenched fist is the two large thumbs sucking and drinking.

original: lag pa rna bar rdeb pa ni //
analyzed: lag pa rna bar rdeb pa ni //
translated: The hand striking the ear🔽is the two large thumbs striking the ear.

original: zhes bya ba ni lag pa g-yon pa rna ba'i rtsar rdeb pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni lag pa g-yon pa rna ba'i rtsar rdeb pa'o //
translated: This is the left hand striking at the ear.

original: blo ldan zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor pa ste /
analyzed: blo ldan zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor pa ste /
translated: The wise one is the yogi.

original: des 'phrog byed ma'i rtags su shes par bya ba zhes bya ba lhag ma yin no //
analyzed: des 'phrog byed ma'i rtags su shes par bya ba zhes bya ba lhag ma yin no //
translated: He should know the sign of the one who steals, the rest.

original: dashta zhes bya ba ni lce rtsa can gyi sha ta'i stan la gnas pa yin no //
analyzed: dashta zhes bya ba ni lce rtsa can gyi sha ta'i stan la gnas pa yin no //
translated: The one called Dasa is the one who is on the seat of the flesh of the tongue-root.

original: sha ba'i mgo ltar ston byed pa //
analyzed: sha ba'i mgo ltar ston byed pa //
translated: The one who shows like the head of a deer

original: zhes bya ba ni sor mo bcu mgor 'jog pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sor mo bcu mgor 'jog pa'o //
translated: is the one who places the ten fingers on the head.

original: rnal 'byor nan tan byed par mtshon / zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor ma rnams kyis rnal 'byor la 'bad par ston pa'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor nan tan byed par mtshon / zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor ma rnams kyis rnal 'byor la 'bad par ston pa'o //
translated: The one who shows the practice of yoga is the one who shows the effort of the yoginis in yoga.

original: nga yis snying sdug grogs po'o //
analyzed: nga yis snying sdug grogs po'o //
translated: My dear friend

original: zhes bya ba ni che ge mo yid du 'ong ba'i mdza' bor ston pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni che ge mo yid du 'ong ba'i mdza' bor ston pa'o //
translated: is the one who shows the dear friend of such and such.

original: bakshe ma yo zhes bya ba ni ma'i gnas su yo bris pa ste /
analyzed: bakshe ma yo zhes bya ba ni ma'i gnas su yo bris pa ste /
translated: The one who is crooked in the place of the mother is the one who writes crookedly in the place of the mother.

original: dor thabs kyis brjod pa'o //
analyzed: dor thabs kyis brjod pa'o //
translated: This is expressed by the method of the anus.

original: lag pa rtsa la 'jug byed na //
analyzed: lag pa rtsa la 'jug byed na //
translated: The one who inserts the hand into the channel

original: zhes bya ba ni rtsa'i 'dab ma la sogs par reg pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rtsa'i 'dab ma la sogs par reg pa'o //
translated: This is the touching of the petals of the lotus and so on.

original: khyod kyi khyim du ngas phyin pa //
analyzed: khyod kyi khyim du ngas phyin pa //
translated: I have come to your house.

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: This is

original: khyod kyi khyim du ngas phyin te slar yang 'ongs pa'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: khyod kyi khyim du ngas phyin te slar yang 'ongs pa'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: the meaning: “I have come to your house and returned again.”

original: med do @140a * //
analyzed: med do @140a * //
translated: There is nothing.

original: zhes bya ba ston pa ni ci yang med do zhes bya bar ston pa ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ston pa ni ci yang med do zhes bya bar ston pa ste /
translated: The demonstration of this is the demonstration of “nothing at all.”

original: de la sh'u n+ya t'a zhes brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: de la sh'u n+ya t'a zhes brjod par bya'o //
translated: Here one should say “śūnyatā.”🔽With outstretched arms,

original: lag pa brkyang ste zhes bya ba ni gru mo bsrang ste'o //🔽phun sum ldan par yod ces pa'o //
analyzed: lag pa brkyang ste zhes bya ba ni gru mo bsrang ste'o // phun sum ldan par yod ces pa'o //
translated: means with raised elbows.🔽“I have everything”

original: zhes bya ba ni ci 'dod pa thams cad bdog go zhes ston pa ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni ci 'dod pa thams cad bdog go zhes ston pa ste /
translated: means “I have everything that is desired.”

original: der tri ka sa ha zhes brjod bar bya'o //
analyzed: der tri ka sa ha zhes brjod bar bya'o //
translated: Here one should say “trikasah.”

original: kha zas za bar 'dod pa'o //
analyzed: kha zas za bar 'dod pa'o //
translated: I want to eat.

original: zhes bya ba ni bkres par ston pa'o //🔽zhe gnag gtum la drag po'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bkres par ston pa'o // zhe gnag gtum la drag po'o //
translated: This shows hunger.🔽I am very cruel and violent.

original: zhes bya ba ni nga ni shin tu zhe gnag la gtum pa'o zhes ston par byed pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni nga ni shin tu zhe gnag la gtum pa'o zhes ston par byed pa'o //
translated: This shows “I am very cruel and violent.”

original: 'dir 'dod pa ni da lta ston //
analyzed: 'dir 'dod pa ni da lta ston //
translated: Here desire is shown now.

original: zhes bya ba ni nga'i 'dod pa ston cig pa ste der aa nang gha yu ta zhes brjod par bya ste khas len pa'i tshig go /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni nga'i 'dod pa ston cig pa ste der aa nang gha yu ta zhes brjod par bya ste khas len pa'i tshig go /
translated: One should say “aṅghāyu” there.🔽The tongue should be rolled.

original: lce 'dril bar byed pa ni lce phyir phyung ste bskyod pa'o //
analyzed: lce 'dril bar byed pa ni lce phyir phyung ste bskyod pa'o //
translated: The tongue should be extended and moved.

original: da lta zhes bya ba ni di ring ngo //
analyzed: da lta zhes bya ba ni di ring ngo //
translated: “Now” means today.

original: 'chi ba ni srog dang 'bral ba'o //🔽tshes grangs shes par 'dod pa'o //
analyzed: 'chi ba ni srog dang 'bral ba'o // tshes grangs shes par 'dod pa'o //
translated: Death is the separation of life.

original: zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor ma rnams 'tshogs pa'i nyi ma shes par 'dod pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor ma rnams 'tshogs pa'i nyi ma shes par 'dod pa'o //
translated: The day of the gathering of the yoginīs is to be known.

original: mthe bos ri mo bri bar bya //
analyzed: mthe bos ri mo bri bar bya //
translated: One should draw with the thumb.

original: zhes bya ba ni mthe bos sor mo bzhi'i tshogs gsum gsum bco lnga'i gnas su reg pas tshes grangs bstan pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni mthe bos sor mo bzhi'i tshogs gsum gsum bco lnga'i gnas su reg pas tshes grangs bstan pa'o //
translated: One should show the day by touching the places of the fifteen finger-breadths with the three groups of four fingers of the thumb.

original: yi ge la sogs pa zhes bya ba ni yang na tshes grangs te yi ge aa la sogs pa brjod pas bstan pa'o //
analyzed: yi ge la sogs pa zhes bya ba ni yang na tshes grangs te yi ge aa la sogs pa brjod pas bstan pa'o //
translated: The letters, etc., are the days, or the day is shown by reciting the letters “a” and so forth.

original: sngar bstan zhes bya ba ni sngar bstan pa dran pa'o //🔽nyin phyed dga' bas rol pa'o //
analyzed: sngar bstan zhes bya ba ni sngar bstan pa dran pa'o // nyin phyed dga' bas rol pa'o //
translated: The previously taught is the remembrance of the previously taught.

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: One should enjoy with the joy of midday.

original: nyi ma phyed dang mtshan phyed la 'tshogs te rol par bya'o zhes ston pa'o //
analyzed: nyi ma phyed dang mtshan phyed la 'tshogs te rol par bya'o zhes ston pa'o //
translated: One should show at noon and midnight, we will gather and enjoy ourselves.

original: rgya mtsho lta bur ston byed pa //
analyzed: rgya mtsho lta bur ston byed pa //
translated: One should show like the ocean.

original: zhes bya ba ni lag pa'i sor mo sbrel nas phyogs kun du rgya mtsho'i chu rlabs ltar sprugs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni lag pa'i sor mo sbrel nas phyogs kun du rgya mtsho'i chu rlabs ltar sprugs pa'o //
translated: This means that one should wave all around with the fingers interlaced like the waves of the ocean.

original: da ltar 'grogs la 'dod zhes bya ba ni gnas che ge mor dang lta lhan cig tu 'dong shig ces ston pa'o //
analyzed: da ltar 'grogs la 'dod zhes bya ba ni gnas che ge mor dang lta lhan cig tu 'dong shig ces ston pa'o //
translated: One should show let us go now and enjoy ourselves, meaning let us go to such and such a place and enjoy ourselves together.

original: mthe bo yis ni srin lag la reg pa //
analyzed: mthe bo yis ni srin lag la reg pa //
translated: One should show the thumb touching the ring finger,

original: zhes bya ba ni mthe bong dang srin lag gi sen mo la phan tshun reg pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni mthe bong dang srin lag gi sen mo la phan tshun reg pa'o //
translated: meaning that one should touch the fingernails of the thumb and ring finger to each other.

original: 'chi bar mi 'gyur ba zhes bya ba ni bdud rtsi ste chang yod do bar ston pa'o //
analyzed: 'chi bar mi 'gyur ba zhes bya ba ni bdud rtsi ste chang yod do bar ston pa'o //
translated: One should show there is no death, meaning that there is nectar, that is, alcohol.

original: bza' la sogs zhes bya ba ni bza' ba la sogs pa'i kha zas yod par ston pa'o //
analyzed: bza' la sogs zhes bya ba ni bza' ba la sogs pa'i kha zas yod par ston pa'o //
translated: One should show food and so forth, meaning that there is food such as edibles.

original: rnal 'byor pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la de kho na nyid kyi rnal 'byor dang ldan pa ni rnal 'byor pa dang rnal 'byor ma rnams te de rnams rol pa'i phyir ngag dang phyag rgya'i brdar byas pa'i cho ga ston par byed pa'i gzhung ni rim🔽par phye ba ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la de kho na nyid kyi rnal 'byor dang ldan pa ni rnal 'byor pa dang rnal 'byor ma rnams te de rnams rol pa'i phyir ngag dang phyag rgya'i brdar byas pa'i cho ga ston par byed pa'i gzhung ni rim par phye ba ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o //
translated: The yogin and so on is the yogin and yoginī endowed with the yoga of reality, and the text that teaches the ritual of the symbolic gestures of speech and gesture for their enjoyment is the chapter.

original: rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje @140b mkha' 'gro'i rnam par bshad pa las le'u nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o /
analyzed: rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje @140b mkha' 'gro'i rnam par bshad pa las le'u nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o /
translated: The twenty-second chapter of the glorious Vajradāka, the great king of tantras, is explained.

original: // / da ni de kho na nyid rtogs pa'i glu dang dbyangs la sog spa rtogs pa bya ba'i phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: // / da ni de kho na nyid rtogs pa'i glu dang dbyangs la sog spa rtogs pa bya ba'i phyir gsungs pa /
translated: Now, in order to understand the songs and melodies of the realization of reality, it is said:

original: lha mo zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: lha mo zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: The goddess and so on.

original: lha mos glu 'di yis ni mnyes par byas //
analyzed: lha mos glu 'di yis ni mnyes par byas //
translated: The goddess pleased him with this song.

original: zhes bya bar sbyar te /
analyzed: zhes bya bar sbyar te /
translated: This is how it is connected.

original: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni lhag ma yin no //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni lhag ma yin no //
translated: The Blessed One is the remainder.

original: ci zhig byas nas she na /
analyzed: ci zhig byas nas she na /
translated: What did she do?

original: gar mdzad de zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: gar mdzad de zhes bya ba ste /
translated: She danced.

original: gar sngon du 'gro ba'i glus mnyes par byas nas gsol ba btab pa yin te /
analyzed: gar sngon du 'gro ba'i glus mnyes par byas nas gsol ba btab pa yin te /
translated: Having pleased him with a dance and song, he supplicates.

original: mnyes pa de yang lus dang ngag gi bya bar gyur pa'i gar dang glu'i mchod pas yang dag par mchod pa'o //
analyzed: mnyes pa de yang lus dang ngag gi bya bar gyur pa'i gar dang glu'i mchod pas yang dag par mchod pa'o //
translated: That pleasing is the perfect worship with the worship of dance and song, which is the activity of body and speech.

original: glu de nyid gsungs pa /
analyzed: glu de nyid gsungs pa /
translated: He states that very song:

original: ae wam zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: ae wam zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: evam, etc.

original: ae zhes bya ba ni lte ba'i chos 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: ae zhes bya ba ni lte ba'i chos 'byung ba'o //
translated: The e is the source of phenomena at the navel.

original: wam zhes bya ba ni bcing ba ste mdud pa'i gnas zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: wam zhes bya ba ni bcing ba ste mdud pa'i gnas zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The vam is the binding, the meaning of which is the place of the knot.

original: si ta aa nur na ni bha zhes bya ba la der si ta ni byang chub kyi sems so //
analyzed: si ta aa nur na ni bha zhes bya ba la der si ta ni byang chub kyi sems so //
translated: In sitānu rani bhe, there the sitā is the bodhicitta.

original: aa nu ra na me tog go //
analyzed: aa nu ra na me tog go //
translated: The anu rani is the flower.

original: ni bha ni rten te de gnyis 'byung ba'i lte ba'i dbus kyi rtsa ba'o //
analyzed: ni bha ni rten te de gnyis 'byung ba'i lte ba'i dbus kyi rtsa ba'o //
translated: The bhe is the support, the channel in the middle of the navel from which those two arise.

original: yang na ni bha ni 'od de lte ba'i dkyil 'khor nas 'byung ba'i me dang bcas pa'i rlung gi 'gro ba'o //
analyzed: yang na ni bha ni 'od de lte ba'i dkyil 'khor nas 'byung ba'i me dang bcas pa'i rlung gi 'gro ba'o //
translated: Alternatively, bhe is light, the movement of the wind that arises from the navel maṇḍala and is endowed with fire.

original: de nyid gsungs pa /
analyzed: de nyid gsungs pa /
translated: He states that:

original: dza ni ta ma dam ga ma aa gam zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: dza ni ta ma dam ga ma aa gam zhes bya ba la /
translated: ja, ta, ma, da, ga, ma, a, ga.

original: ma dha ma ni lte ba'i dbus te rked pa yin la der rlung gi gzugs kyis 'gro ba dang 'ong bar rol pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: ma dha ma ni lte ba'i dbus te rked pa yin la der rlung gi gzugs kyis 'gro ba dang 'ong bar rol pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: Madhyama is the middle of the navel, that is, the waist. The play of the wind in the form of going and coming there is called that.

original: dha dha sha ri ra zhes bya ba la dha zhes bya ba ni 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: dha dha sha ri ra zhes bya ba la dha zhes bya ba ni 'dzin pa'o //
translated: Dha-dha-śa-ri-ra. Dha is grasping.

original: ci zhig ce na /
analyzed: ci zhig ce na /
translated: What?

original: dbyangs kyi yi ge'i lus te sha ri ra'o //
analyzed: dbyangs kyi yi ge'i lus te sha ri ra'o //
translated: The body of the vowel letter, śa-ri-ra.

original: yang na rnam par 'khor bas na dha'o //
analyzed: yang na rnam par 'khor bas na dha'o //
translated: Or, it is dha because it is revolving.

original: ma ya zhes bya ba ni aam zhes bya ba'i ma'i phyed tshal yin te /🔽stong pa nyid rtogs par byed pa'i thig le de'i steng du bzhag pa'o //
analyzed: ma ya zhes bya ba ni aam zhes bya ba'i ma'i phyed tshal yin te / stong pa nyid rtogs par byed pa'i thig le de'i steng du bzhag pa'o //
translated: Maya is the half-moon of the aṃ.

original: ni sa zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: ni sa zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The bindu that causes the realization of emptiness is placed above it.🔽Ni-sa.

original: ni ni rang bzhin med pa'o //
analyzed: ni ni rang bzhin med pa'o //
translated: Ni is essenceless.

original: sa ni zhib ste chos thams cad rang bzhin med par zhi ba de la de skad ces bya ste /
analyzed: sa ni zhib ste chos thams cad rang bzhin med par zhi ba de la de skad ces bya ste /
translated: Sa is peace, all phenomena are peaceful as essenceless. It is called that.

original: 'dir tsheg drag gi mngon pa yin no //
analyzed: 'dir tsheg drag gi mngon pa yin no //
translated: Here, the visarga is the supernormal power.

original: sa sa zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: sa sa zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Sa-sa.

original: rang bzhin med pa'i gtum mo'i rnal 'byor de nyid kyis rtogs pa thams cad drangs nas 'joms par byed pa ste /
analyzed: rang bzhin med pa'i gtum mo'i rnal 'byor de nyid kyis rtogs pa thams cad drangs nas 'joms par byed pa ste /
translated: That very yoga of caṇḍālī without intrinsic nature draws forth and destroys all concepts.

original: des nas gnyis smos pa yin no //
analyzed: des nas gnyis smos pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is said to be the second.

original: ni ga mas sa zhes bya ba la ni 'gro ba ste /
analyzed: ni ga mas sa zhes bya ba la ni 'gro ba ste /
translated: “Nīlāmbara” means “going”

original: 'khor ba yin la aa gam ni de las drangs shing dgug pa'o //
analyzed: 'khor ba yin la aa gam ni de las drangs shing dgug pa'o //
translated: and refers to saṃsāra. “Nīlāmbara” means to draw forth and summon from that.

original: nges pa'i tshig dang ldan pa dang sdig pa'i las thams cad 'dren pas nas sa'o //
analyzed: nges pa'i tshig dang ldan pa dang sdig pa'i las thams cad 'dren pas nas sa'o //
translated: It is “nīsā” because it possesses the etymological definition and draws forth all sinful actions.

original: rig mo bhu ya de zhes bya ba ni bod pa ste de la rig ni bdag med rnal @141a * //🔽'byor ma nyid do //
analyzed: rig mo bhu ya de zhes bya ba ni bod pa ste de la rig ni bdag med rnal @141a * // 'byor ma nyid do //
translated: “Vidyā bhūya te” means “to call,” where “vidyā” is the very yoginī Nairātmya.

original: ma zhes bya ba ni mnyam par gyur pa ste /
analyzed: ma zhes bya ba ni mnyam par gyur pa ste /
translated: “Bhūya” means “to become equal.”

original: su zhig ce na /
analyzed: su zhig ce na /
translated: To whom?

original: bhu ya te zhes bya ba rab tu dga' ba la sogs pa'i sa'i bdag po ste /
analyzed: bhu ya te zhes bya ba rab tu dga' ba la sogs pa'i sa'i bdag po ste /
translated: “Bhūya te” means “to the lord of the stage of the very joyful and so on.”

original: bcom ldan 'das yin la de'i'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das yin la de'i'o //
translated: It is of him, the Bhagavān.

original: ci zhig ce na /
analyzed: ci zhig ce na /
translated: What?

original: sa ri ra zhes bya ba la sogs pa la sa ri ra ni lus te ci zhig ce na /
analyzed: sa ri ra zhes bya ba la sogs pa la sa ri ra ni lus te ci zhig ce na /
translated: “Sarīra” and so on. “Sarīra” is the body. What?

original: sa zhes bya ba ni rtsa'o //
analyzed: sa zhes bya ba ni rtsa'o //
translated: “Sarī” is the channel.

original: sa ram zhes bya ba ni de kho na nyid de der chud pa'i rnal 'byor ro //
analyzed: sa ram zhes bya ba ni de kho na nyid de der chud pa'i rnal 'byor ro //
translated: The essence is reality, the yoga that enters into it.

original: yang ci 'dra zhe na ni sha zhes bya ba la ni ni ma lus pa'o //
analyzed: yang ci 'dra zhe na ni sha zhes bya ba la ni ni ma lus pa'o //
translated: What is it like? Ni means all, and śa means desire.

original: sha ni 'dod pa ste rnal 'byor ma ma lus pa'i 'dod pa'o //
analyzed: sha ni 'dod pa ste rnal 'byor ma ma lus pa'i 'dod pa'o //
translated: It is the desire of all yoginīs.

original: yang na a'i sha ni dbang phyug ste /
analyzed: yang na a'i sha ni dbang phyug ste /
translated: Or, aśa means lord, and ni means all.

original: dbang phyug thams cad thob par byed pa'o //🔽ma dha ma aa dha ma zhes bya ba ni dbus dang 'og tu'o //
analyzed: dbang phyug thams cad thob par byed pa'o // ma dha ma aa dha ma zhes bya ba ni dbus dang 'og tu'o //
translated: It is the attainment of all lords.

original: yang na 'bar bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: yang na 'bar bar byed pa'o //
translated: Madhama adhama means in the middle and below, or it burns.

original: sa sa zhes bya ba la sa ni de ste aa'o //
analyzed: sa sa zhes bya ba la sa ni de ste aa'o //
translated: Sasa means that, that is, a.

original: yang sa zhes bya ba ni bcas pa ste thig le la sogs pa dang bcas par 'jug ba'o //
analyzed: yang sa zhes bya ba ni bcas pa ste thig le la sogs pa dang bcas par 'jug ba'o //
translated: Again, sa means together, that is, entering together with the bindu, and so on.

original: shru ta ni sa sa zhes bya ba la shru ta ni 'dod pa'i don shes pa'o //
analyzed: shru ta ni sa sa zhes bya ba la shru ta ni 'dod pa'i don shes pa'o //
translated: Śrutana isasa means the desire to know the desired object.

original: ni ni 'dren pa ste yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o //🔽sa ni yang dag par 'gro ba ste /
analyzed: ni ni 'dren pa ste yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o //🔽sa ni yang dag par 'gro ba ste /
translated: Ni means to lead, that is, the mental consciousness.🔽 Sa means to go correctly, that is, the object of the mental consciousness.

original: rnam par rtog pa'i rnam par shes pa dang lhan cig tu 'gro ba ste de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa'i rnam par shes pa dang lhan cig tu 'gro ba ste de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: It is the one that moves together with the consciousness of discursive thought, and that is why it is so called.

original: ci zhig ce na /🔽sa sa zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: ci zhig ce na / sa sa zhes bya ba la /
translated: What is it?🔽The syllable sa,

original: lhan cig tu 'jug pas na sa ste yi ge aa'o //
analyzed: lhan cig tu 'jug pas na sa ste yi ge aa'o //
translated: which is the one that moves together with the syllable a, is the one that is called sa.

original: yang sa zhes bya ba ni yig 'bru thams cad kyi mchog go //🔽sa ni sa ri ta zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: yang sa zhes bya ba ni yig 'bru thams cad kyi mchog go // sa ni sa ri ta zhes bya ba la /
translated: Moreover, the syllable sa is the best of all the syllables.

original: sa zhes bya ba ni aa de dang lhan cig tu 'jug pa ste thig le'i steng na gnas pa'i sgra'o //
analyzed: sa zhes bya ba ni aa de dang lhan cig tu 'jug pa ste thig le'i steng na gnas pa'i sgra'o //
translated: The syllable sa is the one that moves together with the syllable a, which is the sound that is located above the bindu.

original: ni zhes bya ba ni ma lus pa'i skye bo thams cad bde bar gshegs pa'i gnas su 'dren pa'o //
analyzed: ni zhes bya ba ni ma lus pa'i skye bo thams cad bde bar gshegs pa'i gnas su 'dren pa'o //
translated: The syllable ni is the one that leads all beings without exception to the state of the Sugata.

original: sa ri ta ni gnas te rtsa'o //
analyzed: sa ri ta ni gnas te rtsa'o //
translated: The syllable ri is the place, which is the nāḍī.

original: 'di dag ni ci byed ce na /
analyzed: 'di dag ni ci byed ce na /
translated: What do they do?

original: bha gam zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: bha gam zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The syllable bha is the bhaga.

original: de kho na nyid kyi phyin ci ma log par rtogs par byed pa'i phyir skal ba dang ldan par byed pa'o //
analyzed: de kho na nyid kyi phyin ci ma log par rtogs par byed pa'i phyir skal ba dang ldan par byed pa'o //
translated: It is the one that makes one fortunate because it causes the realization of reality without error.

original: yang na bha ga ni bcom ldan 'das so //
analyzed: yang na bha ga ni bcom ldan 'das so //
translated: Alternatively, bhaga is the Bhagavān.

original: ma ni bdag ste bdag dang khyod dbyer med par zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
analyzed: ma ni bdag ste bdag dang khyod dbyer med par zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
translated: Mother is the self, up to: the self and you are inseparable.

original: ma ga ma zhes bya ba ni slar yang rtsa'i khyad par bstan pa yin te /
analyzed: ma ga ma zhes bya ba ni slar yang rtsa'i khyad par bstan pa yin te /
translated: The word “mother” indicates a special channel.

original: de la ma zhes bya ba ni lus thams cad la khyab par gnas pas na ma ste rtsa rnams so //
analyzed: de la ma zhes bya ba ni lus thams cad la khyab par gnas pas na ma ste rtsa rnams so //
translated: There, “mother” is the channels, since they abide pervading the entire body.

original: de rnams nas khrag dang chu ser la sogs pa rgyu zhing 'gro bas na aa ga ma'o //
analyzed: de rnams nas khrag dang chu ser la sogs pa rgyu zhing 'gro bas na aa ga ma'o //
translated: Since blood, lymph, and so on flow and move through them, they are “agamas.”

original: yang ci 'dra zhe na /
analyzed: yang ci 'dra zhe na /
translated: What are they like?

original: aa dha ma dha ma sa sa zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: aa dha ma dha ma sa sa zhes bya ba la /
translated: Adhama dhama sasas.

original: aa dha ma ni ma lus pa'o //
analyzed: aa dha ma ni ma lus pa'o //
translated: Adhama means “entire.”

original: dha ma ni go skabs 'byed pa ste nam mkha'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dha ma ni go skabs 'byed pa ste nam mkha'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Dhama means “opening,” because they have the nature of space.

original: yang na dha ma ni bdud 'dul ba ste ma lus pa'i bdud 'dul ba'o //
analyzed: yang na dha ma ni bdud 'dul ba ste ma lus pa'i bdud 'dul ba'o //
translated: Alternatively, dhama means “taming demons,” because they tame all demons.

original: sa sa zhes bya ba ni bdud rnams 'ching ba dang 'joms par byed pa'i @141b phyir gnyis smos so //
analyzed: sa sa zhes bya ba ni bdud rnams 'ching ba dang 'joms par byed pa'i @141b phyir gnyis smos so //
translated: Sasas is stated twice, because they bind and destroy demons.

original: p'a pa ma ya p'a pa dha na ma zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: p'a pa ma ya p'a pa dha na ma zhes bya ba la /
translated: Papa maya papa dhana ma.

original: p'a pa ma ya zhes bya ba ni nad thams cad kyi sdig 'thung bar byed pas na p'a pa ma ya ste bcom ldan 'das la bod pa'o //
analyzed: p'a pa ma ya zhes bya ba ni nad thams cad kyi sdig 'thung bar byed pas na p'a pa ma ya ste bcom ldan 'das la bod pa'o //
translated: Pāpamāya means “to the one who drinks the sin of all diseases,” thus it is Pāpamāya, the Blessed One.

original: yang na rtsa'i khyad par ro //
analyzed: yang na rtsa'i khyad par ro //
translated: Or else, it is a special channel.

original: aa p'a pa de zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: aa p'a pa de zhes bya ba la /
translated: Apāpa-de means

original: aa p'a pa ni dkar po'i las so //
analyzed: aa p'a pa ni dkar po'i las so //
translated: Apāpa is good karma.

original: de zhes bya ba ni ster zhing sbyin pa ste dkar po'i las ster ba'o //
analyzed: de zhes bya ba ni ster zhing sbyin pa ste dkar po'i las ster ba'o //
translated: De means “to give,” “to bestow.” It is the bestowal of good karma.

original: yang na aa ni nye bar bsgyur ba'o //
analyzed: yang na aa ni nye bar bsgyur ba'o //
translated: Or else, a is a prefix.

original: p'a pa ni nag po'i las so //
analyzed: p'a pa ni nag po'i las so //
translated: Pāpa is bad karma.

original: da ni 'dul ba'o //
analyzed: da ni 'dul ba'o //
translated: Da is to tame.

original: nam: ni phyag 'tshal ba'o //
analyzed: nam: ni phyag 'tshal ba'o //
translated: Namaḥ is homage.

original: kye bcom ldan 'das sdig gi rang bzhin sdig med pa stsol ba la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: kye bcom ldan 'das sdig gi rang bzhin sdig med pa stsol ba la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Thus, it means “Homage to the Blessed One, the bestower of sinlessness, the nature of which is sin.”

original: ae wam ma y'a shru tam zhes bya ba'i tshig gi don slar yang bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: ae wam ma y'a shru tam zhes bya ba'i tshig gi don slar yang bshad par bya ste /
translated: The meaning of the words evaṃ mayā śrutam should be explained again.

original: de la ae wam zhes bya ba ni thog ma med pa'i dus nas da ltar gyi bar du rgyun chags par 'jug pa'i 'gro ba rnams so //
analyzed: de la ae wam zhes bya ba ni thog ma med pa'i dus nas da ltar gyi bar du rgyun chags par 'jug pa'i 'gro ba rnams so //
translated: There, evaṃ means “thus,” referring to the beings who have been engaged in a continuous series from beginningless time up to the present.

original: de yang ci 'dra zhe na /
analyzed: de yang ci 'dra zhe na /
translated: What is that like?

original: shrum tam zhes bya ste rna ba'i rnam par shes pas spyod yul du byas pa'o //
analyzed: shrum tam zhes bya ste rna ba'i rnam par shes pas spyod yul du byas pa'o //
translated: Śrutam, that is, it is the domain of experience of the auditory consciousness.

original: 'di ni nye bar mtshon pa ste mthong ba dang reg pa dang bsnams pa dang myong ba dang bsam pa zhes bya ba thams cad so sor sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni nye bar mtshon pa ste mthong ba dang reg pa dang bsnams pa dang myong ba dang bsam pa zhes bya ba thams cad so sor sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: This is an example; all should be applied individually: seen, touched, smelled, tasted, and thought.

original: ci zhig ce na /
analyzed: ci zhig ce na /
translated: What is that like?

original: ma y'a zhes bya ba ste bdag gis thos pa la sogs pa rnams bdag ste rang gi sems yin no zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
analyzed: ma y'a zhes bya ba ste bdag gis thos pa la sogs pa rnams bdag ste rang gi sems yin no zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
translated: Māyā, that is, the self, the mind, is the one who hears, etc., up to the one who thinks.

original: 'di ltar ma y'a ste sems shel ltar rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa rang rig pa tsam yin pas /
analyzed: 'di ltar ma y'a ste sems shel ltar rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa rang rig pa tsam yin pas /
translated: Thus, māyā is the mind, which is mere self-awareness, naturally pure like a crystal.

original: skad cig la rnam par rtog pa'i tshon gyis kha bsgyur bas de dang der snang du zin kyang gang gis mthong ba dang thos pa la sogs pa'i don rnams 'jig par byed pa de ni dper na me long g-ya' dag pa la gzugs brnyan snang ba ltar legs
analyzed: skad cig la rnam par rtog pa'i tshon gyis kha bsgyur bas de dang der snang du zin kyang gang gis mthong ba dang thos pa la sogs pa'i don rnams 'jig par byed pa de ni dper na me long g-ya' dag pa la gzugs brnyan snang ba ltar legs
translated: Even though it is transformed into this and that by the dye of conceptual thought in a moment, it is like a clear mirror in which the objects of seeing, hearing, etc., appear.

original: par byas pa dang / nyes par byas pa dang / bde ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa ni gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i glo bur gyi dri ma dang bral nas rang gi sems kyi snang ba tsam du rtogs par gyur par zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: par byas pa dang / nyes par byas pa dang / bde ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa ni gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i glo bur gyi dri ma dang bral nas rang gi sems kyi snang ba tsam du rtogs par gyur par zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: and the good and bad, happiness and suffering, afflictions and secondary afflictions are the adventitious stains of subject and object, and the meaning of “realized” is that they are realized to be merely appearances of one’s own mind.

original: de yang gsungs pa /
analyzed: de yang gsungs pa /
translated: And that is stated:

original: chos rnams 'di kun stong pa ste //
analyzed: chos rnams 'di kun stong pa ste //
translated: All these phenomena are empty,

original: rten cing 'brel 'byung ston pa yin //🔽zhes gsungs so ;
analyzed: rten cing 'brel 'byung ston pa yin // zhes gsungs so ;
translated: taught as dependently arisen.

original: / yang na bdag gis thos pa dang mthong ba la sogs pa 'di dag dang / dbang po drug ni yul dang yul can ma yin la /
analyzed: / yang na bdag gis thos pa dang mthong ba la sogs pa 'di dag dang / dbang po drug ni yul dang yul can ma yin la /
translated: Or else, “I” and “mine,” “heard” and “seen,” and so on, and the six sense faculties are neither objects nor subjects,

original: de dag thams cad ni dri za'i grong khyer ltar brdzun no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de dag thams cad ni dri za'i grong khyer ltar brdzun no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: and all of them are false, like a city of gandharvas.

original: yang na ae wam ste de dag thams cad rang gis byas shing bcos pas na rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag @142a * //
analyzed: yang na ae wam ste de dag thams cad rang gis byas shing bcos pas na rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag @142a * //
translated: Or else, “evam” means that all of them are fabricated and contrived, and so are naturally pure.

original: pa'o ; / de ltar mchod par byas kyi 'og tu gsol ba btab par blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: pa'o ; / de ltar mchod par byas kyi 'og tu gsol ba btab par blta bar bya'o //
translated: Thus, after making offerings, one should understand that one should make requests.

original: de ltar gsol ba btab kyi 'og tu gza'i 'khor lo dang r'a sa'i 'khor lo la spyod pa'i 'khor lo gsungs pa /
analyzed: de ltar gsol ba btab kyi 'og tu gza'i 'khor lo dang r'a sa'i 'khor lo la spyod pa'i 'khor lo gsungs pa /
translated: After making requests, the wheel of the planets and the wheel of the nakṣatras are taught:

original: shar du me zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: shar du me zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: In the east, fire, and so on.

original: 'dir yang sngar bstan pa bzhin du phan tshun du thig bzhi btab la yang mtshams bzhi bris nas tha ma bskor ba dang ldan pas rtsibs bcu gnyis pa'i 'khor lor 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'dir yang sngar bstan pa bzhin du phan tshun du thig bzhi btab la yang mtshams bzhi bris nas tha ma bskor ba dang ldan pas rtsibs bcu gnyis pa'i 'khor lor 'gyur ro //
translated: Here, as previously explained, having laid out four lines crosswise, having drawn the four directions, and having encircled the end, it becomes a wheel with twelve spokes.

original: de'i shar phyogs kyi rtsibs su ni yi ge me bri'o //🔽gshin rjer ni bhre zhes bya ba ni lho'i rtsibs la yi ge bhre bri ba'o //
analyzed: de'i shar phyogs kyi rtsibs su ni yi ge me bri'o // gshin rjer ni bhre zhes bya ba ni lho'i rtsibs la yi ge bhre bri ba'o //
translated: On the spoke in the east, one should write the syllable me.🔽In the south, bhre means that on the spoke in the south, one should write the syllable bhre.

original: nub tu me zhes bya ba ni nub phyogs su yi ge me bri ba'o //
analyzed: nub tu me zhes bya ba ni nub phyogs su yi ge me bri ba'o //
translated: In the west, me means that in the west, one should write the syllable me.

original: byang du de bzhin du ku zhes bya ba yang de bzhin te /
analyzed: byang du de bzhin du ku zhes bya ba yang de bzhin te /
translated: In the north, ku is also like that.

original: de dag gis ni lug dang khyu mchog dang 'khrig pa dang karka ta zhes bya ba'i r'a si bzhi'i ming bstan pa yin te /
analyzed: de dag gis ni lug dang khyu mchog dang 'khrig pa dang karka ta zhes bya ba'i r'a si bzhi'i ming bstan pa yin te /
translated: These indicate the names of the four signs of the sheep, bull, copulation, and crab.

original: dper na snam bu'i grva nas snam bu rangs pa 'dren pa ltar ming gi yi ge dang po tsam gyis kyang ming rangs pa bstan par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dper na snam bu'i grva nas snam bu rangs pa 'dren pa ltar ming gi yi ge dang po tsam gyis kyang ming rangs pa bstan par 'gyur ro //
translated: Just as the corner of a cloth indicates the whole cloth, so the first letter of the name indicates the whole name.

original: r'a si zhes bya ba ni yi ge r'a si bri ba'o //
analyzed: r'a si zhes bya ba ni yi ge r'a si bri ba'o //
translated: Rāsi means the writing of the letter ra.

original: de bzhin du ma ga dang / tu ku dang bi ma rnams kyang shes par bya ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du ma ga dang / tu ku dang bi ma rnams kyang shes par bya ste /
translated: Similarly, one should understand the ma, tu, and vi.

original: de dag gis kyang gzhu dang / seng ge dang / chu srin dang / gzhon nu ma dang / srang dang / bum pa dang / sdig pa dang / nya zhes bya ba'i bar gyi r'a si brgyad rim bzhin du so sor bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: de dag gis kyang gzhu dang / seng ge dang / chu srin dang / gzhon nu ma dang / srang dang / bum pa dang / sdig pa dang / nya zhes bya ba'i bar gyi r'a si brgyad rim bzhin du so sor bstan pa yin no //
translated: These indicate the eight signs of the bow, lion, crocodile, maiden, scales, pitcher, scorpion, and fish, respectively.

original: da ni gza' rnam pa lnga dang aa la sogs pa dbyangs kyi yi ge lnga sbyar ba bstan pa'i phyir aa ni sgur po'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: da ni gza' rnam pa lnga dang aa la sogs pa dbyangs kyi yi ge lnga sbyar ba bstan pa'i phyir aa ni sgur po'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Now, in order to teach the conjunction of the five kinds of planets and the five vowels beginning with a, he says a is crooked, etc.

original: sgur po zhes bya ba ni mig dmar ro //
analyzed: sgur po zhes bya ba ni mig dmar ro //
translated: Kubera is Mangala.

original: ai ni zla ba las skyes pa'o zhes bya ba las zla skyes ni gza' lhag ste zla ba'i bu zhes grags pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ai ni zla ba las skyes pa'o zhes bya ba las zla skyes ni gza' lhag ste zla ba'i bu zhes grags pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The word born from the moon means Budha, because he is known as the son of the moon.

original: au ni lha'i bla ma'o zhes bya ba la lha'i bla ma ni lha rnams kyi ston pa ste gza' phur bu'o //
analyzed: au ni lha'i bla ma'o zhes bya ba la lha'i bla ma ni lha rnams kyi ston pa ste gza' phur bu'o //
translated: The word teacher of the gods means Brihaspati, because he is the teacher of the gods.

original: nyi ma'i bu zhes bya ba ni spen pa'o //
analyzed: nyi ma'i bu zhes bya ba ni spen pa'o //
translated: The word son of the sun means Shukra, because he is the son of the sun.

original: 'o zhes bya ba ni lta 'og kun du yang shes par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'o zhes bya ba ni lta 'og kun du yang shes par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The word and so on means that this should be understood for all the following [planets].

original: zla ba dang nyi ma gsungs pa /
analyzed: zla ba dang nyi ma gsungs pa /
translated: The moon and sun are mentioned.

original: gza' rnams kyi ni cho ga la //
analyzed: gza' rnams kyi ni cho ga la //
translated: In the ritual of the planets,

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: it is said:

original: cho ga zhes bya ba ni bskyed par bya ba ste /
analyzed: cho ga zhes bya ba ni bskyed par bya ba ste /
translated: The word ritual means that which is to be produced.

original: gza' rnams kyi nang nas zla ba dang nyi mas bskyed par bya ba'i gza' lhag pa dang spen pa gnyis kyi nang du zla ba dang nyi ma gnyis bsdu bar brjod do zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gza' rnams kyi nang nas zla ba dang nyi mas bskyed par bya ba'i gza' lhag pa dang spen pa gnyis kyi nang du zla ba dang nyi ma gnyis bsdu bar brjod do zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Among the planets, the two planets produced by the moon and sun, Budha and Shukra, are included in the moon and sun, meaning that they are included in the two.

original: da ni r'a si bcu gnyis bris pa'i 'khor lo la /
analyzed: da ni r'a si bcu gnyis bris pa'i 'khor lo la /
translated: Now, on the wheel written with the twelve signs,

original: gza' rnams kyi yi ge bris nas so sor sbyar ba bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gza' rnams kyi yi ge bris nas so sor sbyar ba bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to show the writing of the letters of the planets and their individual application,

original: zla ba karka ta la dbang //
analyzed: zla ba karka ta la dbang //
translated: [the root text] states, “The moon in Cancer,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: and so forth.”

original: @142b karka t'i re'u mig la zla ba'i yi ge bkod nas des de la longs spyod cing mthun par brtsi bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //🔽nyi ma drang srong gdong lnga la //
analyzed: @142b karka t'i re'u mig la zla ba'i yi ge bkod nas des de la longs spyod cing mthun par brtsi bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to // nyi ma drang srong gdong lnga la //
translated: The meaning is that having arranged the letter of the moon in the square of Cancer, one should calculate the enjoyment and compatibility by that.

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: [The root text] states, “The sun in the five-faced sage.”

original: drang srong gdong lnga ni seng ge ste /
analyzed: drang srong gdong lnga ni seng ge ste /
translated: The five-faced sage is a lion.

original: seng ge'i re'u cha la bri'o //🔽gza' rnams lhag ma ji snyed pa //
analyzed: seng ge'i re'u cha la bri'o // gza' rnams lhag ma ji snyed pa //
translated: [The sun] should be written in the square of the lion.

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: [The root text] states, “The remaining planets🔽in the two Rāsīs.”

original: mig dmar la sogs pa'i gza' lhag ma lnga'o //
analyzed: mig dmar la sogs pa'i gza' lhag ma lnga'o //
translated: The remaining five planets are Mars and so forth.

original: r'a si gnyis gnyis la ni spyod //
analyzed: r'a si gnyis gnyis la ni spyod //
translated: [The root text] states, “Each planet in the two Rāsīs.”

original: ces bya ba ni lug la sogs pa'i r'a si lhag ma bcu'i re'u char rim bzhin du r'a si gnyis gnyis kyi gnas su gza' re re bri ba'o //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni lug la sogs pa'i r'a si lhag ma bcu'i re'u char rim bzhin du r'a si gnyis gnyis kyi gnas su gza' re re bri ba'o //
translated: The meaning is that each planet should be written in the squares of the remaining ten Rāsīs, such as Aries, in the places of the two Rāsīs in order.

original: spyod ces bya ba ni skyong zhing gso ba ste /
analyzed: spyod ces bya ba ni skyong zhing gso ba ste /
translated: “Enjoyment” means to nurture and care for.

original: 'di ltar 'dri ba'i pho nya me tog dor ba dang lag pas reg kyang rung ste /
analyzed: 'di ltar 'dri ba'i pho nya me tog dor ba dang lag pas reg kyang rung ste /
translated: Thus, the messenger who asks in this way, whether by throwing a flower or by touching with the hand,

original: gza' dang de'i re'u cha rnams kyi mthun pa dang mi mthun par r'a si las shes par bya'o //
analyzed: gza' dang de'i re'u cha rnams kyi mthun pa dang mi mthun par r'a si las shes par bya'o //
translated: should know the compatibility and incompatibility of the planets and their houses from the Rāśi.

original: r'a si rnams kyang sngar bstan pa'i tshul gyis 'phel ba la sogs pa dang sbyar bar bya ste /
analyzed: r'a si rnams kyang sngar bstan pa'i tshul gyis 'phel ba la sogs pa dang sbyar bar bya ste /
translated: And the Rāśis should be applied to the increase, etc., in the manner previously taught.

original: de'i skyon dang yon tan shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i skyon dang yon tan shes par bya'o //
translated: One should know their faults and virtues.

original: de bzhin du r'a si gang las skyes pa'i mi'i mtshan nyid kyang 'phel ba la sogs pa las shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du r'a si gang las skyes pa'i mi'i mtshan nyid kyang 'phel ba la sogs pa las shes par bya'o //
translated: In the same way, the characteristics of the person born in a Rāśi should be known from the increase, etc.

original: da ni sgang gshong gi 'khor lo zhu ba gsungs pa /
analyzed: da ni sgang gshong gi 'khor lo zhu ba gsungs pa /
translated: Now, the question of the Wheel of Hills and Valleys is stated:

original: sgang gshong 'khor lo zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: sgang gshong 'khor lo zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: The so-called Wheel of Hills and Valleys, etc.

original: sgang gshong zhes bya ba ni r'a si rnams so //
analyzed: sgang gshong zhes bya ba ni r'a si rnams so //
translated: Here, hills and valleys are the Rāśis.

original: khyod kyis bshad ces bya ba ni sngar gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: khyod kyis bshad ces bya ba ni sngar gsungs pa'o //
translated: You explained means what was previously stated.

original: sngar gsungs mod kyi 'on kyang skar ma dus dang zhes bya ba la sogs pas khyad par la rmongs pa ston pa yin te /
analyzed: sngar gsungs mod kyi 'on kyang skar ma dus dang zhes bya ba la sogs pas khyad par la rmongs pa ston pa yin te /
translated: Although it was previously stated, still, through the words “star, time, etc.” he teaches confusion about the particulars.

original: skar ma zhes bya ba ni rgyu skar ro //
analyzed: skar ma zhes bya ba ni rgyu skar ro //
translated: “Star” means the lunar mansion.

original: dus zhes bya ba ni zla ba'o //
analyzed: dus zhes bya ba ni zla ba'o //
translated: “Time” means the moon.

original: nyi ma zhes bya ba ni tshes grangs te /
analyzed: nyi ma zhes bya ba ni tshes grangs te /
translated: “Sun” means the date.

original: gza' rnams kyang gzung bar bya'o //
analyzed: gza' rnams kyang gzung bar bya'o //
translated: The planets should also be included.

original: bye brag ni de rnams kyi khyad par ro //
analyzed: bye brag ni de rnams kyi khyad par ro //
translated: “Particular” means their distinctions.

original: lug dang ro hi ta la sogs pa'i sgra ni gnyis kar sbyor te /
analyzed: lug dang ro hi ta la sogs pa'i sgra ni gnyis kar sbyor te /
translated: The words “sheep, Rohita, etc.” are applied to both.

original: lug la sogs pa'i r'a si dang / ro hi ta la sogs pa'i sa'i dbang phyug rnams kyi'o //
analyzed: lug la sogs pa'i r'a si dang / ro hi ta la sogs pa'i sa'i dbang phyug rnams kyi'o //
translated: The “sheep, etc.” are the Rasis, and the “Rohita, etc.” are the lords of the earth.

original: gang gi 'chi ba bshad kyis nyon //
analyzed: gang gi 'chi ba bshad kyis nyon //
translated: Listen to the explanation of whose death is certain.

original: zhes bya ba gang gi zhes bya ba ni lug la sogs pa r'a si gang las skyes pa'i mi'i ste de'i 'chi ba nges pa nyon cig pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba gang gi zhes bya ba ni lug la sogs pa r'a si gang las skyes pa'i mi'i ste de'i 'chi ba nges pa nyon cig pa'o //
translated: “Whose” means of which man the Rasi of the sheep, etc. was born, and “listen to the explanation of whose death is certain.”

original: nges pa de yang gsungs pa /
analyzed: nges pa de yang gsungs pa /
translated: That certainty is also stated.

original: zla ba dang ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: zla ba dang ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: “The moon, etc.”

original: dus zhes bya ba ni dgongs mo la sogs pa'o //🔽gdon zhes bya ba ni mgul nad la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: dus zhes bya ba ni dgongs mo la sogs pa'o // gdon zhes bya ba ni mgul nad la sogs pa'o //
translated: The time is evening, etc.🔽The demon is a disease of the throat, etc.

original: nad ces bya ba ni smyo ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: nad ces bya ba ni smyo ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: The disease is madness, etc.

original: lhag ma ni go sla'o //
analyzed: lhag ma ni go sla'o //
translated: The rest is easy to understand.

original: sgang gshong zhes bya ba ni sgang gshong gi 'khor lo'o //
analyzed: sgang gshong zhes bya ba ni sgang gshong gi 'khor lo'o //
translated: The high and low is the wheel of high and low.

original: tshad ma zhes bya ba ni nges pa'o //
analyzed: tshad ma zhes bya ba ni nges pa'o //
translated: The measure is the certainty.

original: gang zhig las ni skyes pa zhes bya ba ni r'a si gang las skyes pa'o //
analyzed: gang zhig las ni skyes pa zhes bya ba ni r'a si gang las skyes pa'o //
translated: The from which one is born is the Rāśi from which one is born.

original: brjod ces @143a * //
analyzed: brjod ces @143a * //
translated: The said

original: bya ba ni thub pa rnams kyis brjod cing gsal bar mdzad pa ste /
analyzed: bya ba ni thub pa rnams kyis brjod cing gsal bar mdzad pa ste /
translated: is that which is said and made clear by the sages.

original: de 'dir bshad kyi nyon zhes bya ba dang sbyar ro //
analyzed: de 'dir bshad kyi nyon zhes bya ba dang sbyar ro //
translated: That is explained here, connected with listen!

original: da ni r'a si gang las skyes pa'i mi 'chi ba'i dus kyi zla ba dang skar ma dang gza' dang dus la sogs pa rim pa bzhin du sbyar te gsungs pa /
analyzed: da ni r'a si gang las skyes pa'i mi 'chi ba'i dus kyi zla ba dang skar ma dang gza' dang dus la sogs pa rim pa bzhin du sbyar te gsungs pa /
translated: Now, the time of death of a person born in which Rāśi is stated in order, beginning with the moon, stars, planets, and time, etc.

original: bha dra yi ni nyi ma la //
analyzed: bha dra yi ni nyi ma la //
translated: On the sun of Bhadrapada,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: etc.

original: bha dra'i nyi ma ni lug gi nyi ma la skyes pa'i mi'o //
analyzed: bha dra'i nyi ma ni lug gi nyi ma la skyes pa'i mi'o //
translated: The person born on the sun of Aries.

original: dgun zla ra ba'i zhes bya ba ni dgun zla ra ba de'i tshes gsum dang sbyar ro //
analyzed: dgun zla ra ba'i zhes bya ba ni dgun zla ra ba de'i tshes gsum dang sbyar ro //
translated: The first winter month is to be connected with the third day.

original: dgun zla ra ba de'i gza' mig dmar dang rgyu skar smin drug ldan pa ste 'dzom par gyur na de ni de'i 'chi ba'i dus la bab pa yin no //
analyzed: dgun zla ra ba de'i gza' mig dmar dang rgyu skar smin drug ldan pa ste 'dzom par gyur na de ni de'i 'chi ba'i dus la bab pa yin no //
translated: If that first winter month has the planet Mars and the lunar mansion Puṣya, then that is the time of his death.

original: lug gi mi 'chi ba'i dus bstan nas /
analyzed: lug gi mi 'chi ba'i dus bstan nas /
translated: Having taught the time of death for the man of Aries,

original: khyu mchog gi dus bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: khyu mchog gi dus bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: in order to teach the time for the man of Taurus,

original: khyu mchog ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: khyu mchog ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: he says, the man of Taurus, etc.

original: lus kyi mtshan ma la sogs pa zhes bya ba nyid smyo zhing mgul pa'i nad ces bya ba yin te /
analyzed: lus kyi mtshan ma la sogs pa zhes bya ba nyid smyo zhing mgul pa'i nad ces bya ba yin te /
translated: The body sign, etc. is itself the madness and throat disease.

original: de la mgul pa'i nad ni lkog 'gags kyi nad de gdon las gyur pa yin la /
analyzed: de la mgul pa'i nad ni lkog 'gags kyi nad de gdon las gyur pa yin la /
translated: There, the throat disease is a disease of the throat, which is caused by a spirit.

original: de ni lus kyi mtshan ma yin no //
analyzed: de ni lus kyi mtshan ma yin no //
translated: That is the body sign.

original: smyo ba ni sems dran pa med par gyur pa ste /
analyzed: smyo ba ni sems dran pa med par gyur pa ste /
translated: Madness is the mind becoming without mindfulness.

original: sems kyi mtshan ma'o //
analyzed: sems kyi mtshan ma'o //
translated: That is the mind sign.

original: de yang de gnyis gcig gis 'chi bar shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de yang de gnyis gcig gis 'chi bar shes par bya'o //
translated: And that is to be known as death by both of them.

original: nam zhe na dgun zla 'bring po'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: nam zhe na dgun zla 'bring po'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: When? “In the middle month of winter,” etc.

original: dgun zla 'bring po'i tshes bzhi la gal te gza' lhag dang snar ma 'dzom par gyur na dgongs mo'i dus su 'chi bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: dgun zla 'bring po'i tshes bzhi la gal te gza' lhag dang snar ma 'dzom par gyur na dgongs mo'i dus su 'chi bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: If on the fourth day of the middle month of winter, Jupiter and the Pleiades are in conjunction, then one will die at dusk.

original: snar ma zhes bya ba ni padma las byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: snar ma zhes bya ba ni padma las byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The Pleiades are so called because they are born from the lotus.

original: 'khrig pa las skyes pa'i mi'i dus gsungs pa /
analyzed: 'khrig pa las skyes pa'i mi'i dus gsungs pa /
translated: The time of birth of a man born of sexual intercourse is stated:

original: dgun zla tha chungs zhes bya ba la sogs pa la mgo zhes bya ba ni ri dags kyi mgo ste /
analyzed: dgun zla tha chungs zhes bya ba la sogs pa la mgo zhes bya ba ni ri dags kyi mgo ste /
translated: “In the last month of winter,” etc. The head is the head of a deer.

original: ri dags kyi mgo zhes bya bar grags pa'o //
analyzed: ri dags kyi mgo zhes bya bar grags pa'o //
translated: It is known as the head of a deer.

original: 'khrig pa'i mi zhes bya ba ni 'khrig pa las skyes pa'i zhes bya ba ni lhag ma yin no //
analyzed: 'khrig pa'i mi zhes bya ba ni 'khrig pa las skyes pa'i zhes bya ba ni lhag ma yin no //
translated: A man born of sexual intercourse is one born of sexual intercourse.

original: karka ta las skyes pa'i dus gsungs pa /
analyzed: karka ta las skyes pa'i dus gsungs pa /
translated: The time of birth of a man born of Cancer is stated:

original: dpyid zla ra ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: dpyid zla ra ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: “In the first month of spring,” etc.

original: karka ta zhes bya ba ni karka ta las skyes pa'i mi'o //
analyzed: karka ta zhes bya ba ni karka ta las skyes pa'i mi'o //
translated: Cancer is a man born of Cancer.

original: lhag ma ni go sla'o //
analyzed: lhag ma ni go sla'o //
translated: The rest is easy to understand.

original: seng ge las skyes pa'i dus gsungs pa /
analyzed: seng ge las skyes pa'i dus gsungs pa /
translated: The time of birth from a lion is stated:

original: dpyid zla 'bring po'i gnyis lnga la //
analyzed: dpyid zla 'bring po'i gnyis lnga la //
translated: In the middle month of spring, on the fifth of the two,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la gnyis lnga ni bcu ste de'i tshes bcu la 'chi bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba dang sbyar ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la gnyis lnga ni bcu ste de'i tshes bcu la 'chi bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba dang sbyar ro //
translated: In this, the two fives are ten. It should be connected with “death on the tenth day.”

original: gzhon nu ma las skyes pa'i dus gsungs pa /
analyzed: gzhon nu ma las skyes pa'i dus gsungs pa /
translated: The time of birth from a maiden is stated:

original: dpyid zla tha chungs zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: dpyid zla tha chungs zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: In the last month of spring, on the twelfth,

original: bcu gnyis zhes bya ba ni tshes bcu gnyis la'o //
analyzed: bcu gnyis zhes bya ba ni tshes bcu gnyis la'o //
translated: In this, the twelfth is the twelfth day.

original: srang las skyes pa'i dus gsungs pa /
analyzed: srang las skyes pa'i dus gsungs pa /
translated: The time of birth from a scale is stated:

original: dbyar zlar @143b ba'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: dbyar zlar @143b ba'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: In the summer month, on the fourteenth,

original: 'dir yang bcu bzhi zhes bya ba ni tshes yin no //
analyzed: 'dir yang bcu bzhi zhes bya ba ni tshes yin no //
translated: In this, the fourteenth is the fourteenth day.

original: gzhan dag la yang de ltar sbyar bar bya'o //🔽dbyar zla ba 'bring po zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni sdig pa las skyes pa'i mi'i dus bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: gzhan dag la yang de ltar sbyar bar bya'o // dbyar zla ba 'bring po zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni sdig pa las skyes pa'i mi'i dus bstan pa yin no //
translated: It should be applied in the same way to the others.🔽The statement beginning “In the middle month of summer” teaches the time of a man born from a sinner.

original: dbyar zla tha chungs zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni gzhu las skyes pa'i dus bstan pa yin te /
analyzed: dbyar zla tha chungs zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni gzhu las skyes pa'i dus bstan pa yin te /
translated: The statement beginning “In the last month of summer” teaches the time of one born from a bow.

original: de dag ni go sla'o //
analyzed: de dag ni go sla'o //
translated: These are easy to understand.

original: de dag nges par ldan gyur na //
analyzed: de dag nges par ldan gyur na //
translated: When they are definitely possessed,

original: zhes bya ba ni zla ba dang gza' dang skar ma rnams te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni zla ba dang gza' dang skar ma rnams te /
translated: the moon, planets, and stars.

original: de rnams ji skad smos pa bzhin ldan par gyur na'o //🔽ston zla ra ba zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni chu srin las skyes pa'i dus bstan to //
analyzed: de rnams ji skad smos pa bzhin ldan par gyur na'o // ston zla ra ba zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni chu srin las skyes pa'i dus bstan to //
translated: When they are possessed as described,🔽The first autumn month, etc.🔽teaches the time of birth from Makara.🔽The middle autumn month, etc.

original: ston zla 'bring po zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni bum pa las skyes pa'i dus bstan pa yin te /
analyzed: ston zla 'bring po zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni bum pa las skyes pa'i dus bstan pa yin te /
translated: teaches the time of birth from Kumbha.

original: de la zad pa zhes bya ba ni zad par byed pa ste gshin rje'o //
analyzed: de la zad pa zhes bya ba ni zad par byed pa ste gshin rje'o //
translated: There, “death” is the one who causes death, namely, Yama.

original: 'gro ba ni de'i grong khyer du 'gro ba'o //
analyzed: 'gro ba ni de'i grong khyer du 'gro ba'o //
translated: “Going” is going to his city.

original: yang na zad pa ni tshe zad pa'o //
analyzed: yang na zad pa ni tshe zad pa'o //
translated: Alternatively, “death” is the exhaustion of life.

original: 'gro ba ni 'chi ba'i de kho na nyid du 'gro ba'o //
analyzed: 'gro ba ni 'chi ba'i de kho na nyid du 'gro ba'o //
translated: “Going” is going to the reality of death.🔽The last autumn month, etc.

original: ston zla tha chungs zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni nyi las skyes pa'i dus bstan pa yin te /
analyzed: ston zla tha chungs zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni nyi las skyes pa'i dus bstan pa yin te /
translated: teaches the time of birth from Meena.

original: de dag kyang go sla'o //
analyzed: de dag kyang go sla'o //
translated: These are easy to understand.

original: sngon du zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: sngon du zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: Previously, etc.

original: skye dus zhes bya ba ni lug la sogs pa las skyes pa'o //
analyzed: skye dus zhes bya ba ni lug la sogs pa las skyes pa'o //
translated: The time of birth is the time when the child is born from the sheep, etc.

original: zhi dang drag po dpyad par bya //
analyzed: zhi dang drag po dpyad par bya //
translated: One should examine the gentle and fierce.

original: zhes bya ba ni sngon du zhes bya ba dang sbyar te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sngon du zhes bya ba dang sbyar te /
translated: The word first is supplied.

original: sngon du gza' la sogs pa 'jam pa dang rtsub pa'i shes par bya'o //
analyzed: sngon du gza' la sogs pa 'jam pa dang rtsub pa'i shes par bya'o //
translated: One should know the gentle and fierce planets, etc.

original: tshe dang 'chi dus la sogs pa //
analyzed: tshe dang 'chi dus la sogs pa //
translated: Life, time of death, etc.

original: zhes bya ba ni ji srid gcig gnas par 'gyur pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni ji srid gcig gnas par 'gyur pa'o //
translated: is the length of time that one will live.

original: de nas zhes bya ba ni legs par shes nas so //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba ni legs par shes nas so //
translated: The word then means after one has understood.

original: de dag gis ni 'di skad du me tog bor ba la sogs pa'i cho ga tsam gyis kyang 'jam pa dang rtsub pa'i gza' rnams kyi bye brag shes par byas la /
analyzed: de dag gis ni 'di skad du me tog bor ba la sogs pa'i cho ga tsam gyis kyang 'jam pa dang rtsub pa'i gza' rnams kyi bye brag shes par byas la /
translated: They are teaching that one should make a prediction by means of the mere rite of casting the flower, etc., knowing the distinction of the gentle and fierce planets, etc.,

original: ro hi ta la sogs pa las skyes pa'i byis pa 'dis ni 'di srid cig 'tsho bar 'gyur ro zhes rim pa bzhin lung bstan par bya'i gzhan du ni ma yin no zhes bya bar ston to //
